1b1('bum): dum bu drug pa'o//
1b2('bum): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i/ byang
1b3('bum): chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs songs su gzung ba dang
1b4('bum): myed par byaba'i phyir myi slob po// tshor pa yongs su gzung ba dang
1b5('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ 'du shes yongs su gzung ba dang / myed par bya ba'i phyir slab po
1b6('bum): 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang / myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rnam par shes pa yongs
2a1('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rna ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ sna yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// skye
2a2('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// lus yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// yid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po
2a3('bum): gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// sgra yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dri yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po/
2a4('bum): ro yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// reg yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// chos yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po
2a5('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya/ ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yo/ ngas su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/
2a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ lus kyi rnam par shes
2a7('bum): pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// / myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su
2a8('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob zo / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed
2b1('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myil
2b2('bum): slob bo yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob
2b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myil
2b4('bum): slob bo/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su
2b5('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// yi da kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// sa'i
2b6('bum): khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// chu'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// me'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
2b7('bum): phyir myi slob bo rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// nam mkha'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ rnam par shes
2b8('bum): pa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bro 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
3a1('bum): pa'i phyir myi slob po rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// mying dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir
3a2('bum): myi slob po skye mched drug yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang
3a3('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// sred pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po// lend pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ srid pa yongs
3a4('bum): su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
3a5('bum): phyir myi slob bo sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yo/ ngas su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba
3a6('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung
3a7('bum): pa dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
3a8('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// / nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir
3b1('bum): myi slob po phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ chen
3b2('bum): po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su
3b3('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang
3b4('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs
3b5('bum): su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// ra pa bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
3b6('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su la
3b7('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed
3b8('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang
4a1('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang
4a2('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/
4a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po
4a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po
4a5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
4a6('bum): phyir myi slob po/ rnam pa rang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par
4a7('bum): bya ba'i phyir gyi slob bo/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sde spyod pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// mngon
4a8('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
4b1('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su
4b2('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// byams pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang
4b3('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po/ snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su gzung ba dang myed par
4b4('bum): bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'dra/ sa bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su
4b5('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ phyi ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ dgra bcom pa nyid la
4b6('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed
4b7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' seMs
4b8('bum): dpa' chen po ci'i phyir na gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
5a1('bum): ci'i phyir na 'du shes yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/
5a2('bum): ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na myig yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir
5a3('bum): na rna ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na sna yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lce yongs su la
5a4('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir ma lus yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na yid yongs
5a5('bum): su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya/ ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na smra yongs
5a6('bum): su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na dri yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na ro yongs su gzung ba dang myed
5a7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na reg yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na chos yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir
5a8('bum): myi slob pa yin// ci'i phyir na myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir nurna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba
5b1('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su
5b2('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob po yin/ ci'i phyir na yid kyi rnam par
5b3('bum): shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin// ci'i phyir na myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir
5b4('bum): narna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed pa bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na sA'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
5b5('bum): phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir/ myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lus kyi 'dus te
5b6('bum): reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir gyi slob pa yin ci'i phyir na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin// ci'i phyir na
5b7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir mam ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang byed
5b8('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin ci'i phyi ma sa snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir gyi slob pa yin ci'i phyimar sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i
6a1('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba myed par bya ba'i phyir
6a2('bum): myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na yin kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin// ci'i phyir na sa'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang
6a3('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin ci'i phyir na chu'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na mye'i khams yongs su gzung ba dang la
6a4('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rlung gi khams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir/ myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na nam mkha'i khams
6a5('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa'i khams yo/ ngas su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
6a6('bum): ci'i phyir na ma rig pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'du byed yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rnam
6a7('bum): par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na mying dang gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na skye mched
6a8('bum): yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na reg pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na tshor ba yongs su gzung
6b1('bum): ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir ma sred pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na lend pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
6b2('bum): phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na srid pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na skye ba yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
6b3('bum): ci'i phyir na rga shi yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i
6b4('bum): phyir na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung pa dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyi/ ra na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba
6b5('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir/ ran brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
6b6('bum): ci'i phyir na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su gzung ba la
6b7('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin// ci'i phyir na nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na phyi stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang
6b8('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung
7a1('bum): pa dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na chen po stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir mngon dam pa stong pa la
7a2('bum): nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'dus ma
7a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/
7a4('bum): ci'i phyir na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang
7a5('bum): myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyiran rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang skye da par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na
7a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa la
7a7('bum): yin/ ci'i phyir na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par
7a8('bum): bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
7b1('bum): gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na yang dag par
7b2('bum): spong ba rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir
7b3('bum): ma dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na byang
7b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed
7b5('bum): par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na'aphags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na bas
7b6('bum): gtan rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na tshad myed pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na
7b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rnam par tha rad pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya
7b8('bum): ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rnam
8a1('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na mngon par
8a2('bum): shes pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i
8a3('bum): phyir na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i
8a4('bum): phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na so so yang dag
8a5('bum): par rig pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na bya ma sa pa chen po yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir
8a6('bum): myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su gzung ba
8a7('bum): dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin ci'i phyir na lan cig phyir
8a8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir mya slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
8b1('bum): ci'i phyir na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rang byang chub yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin
8b2('bum): ci'i phyir na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa yin/ ci'i phyir na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya/
8b3('bum): pa'i phyir myi slob pa yin// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs
8b4('bum): la gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/
8b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du shes la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du shes la 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar 'du byed la yongs
8b6('bum): su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed la 'du byed mo su kyi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
8b7('bum): rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar myig la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig la myig yongs su myi 'dzin to/
8b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar rna ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba la rna ba yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar sna la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi na pa
9a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna la sna yongs su myi 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar lce la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce la lce yongs su myi 'dzin to
9a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar lus la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus la lus yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar yid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
9a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la yid yongs su myi 'dzind to// / de ni 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su
9a4('bum): myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar smra la yongs su 'dzi nad pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sgra la sna yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar dri la yongs
9a5('bum): su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyiradri la dri yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar ro// la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa la
9a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir ro la ro yongs su myi 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar reg la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir reg la reg yongs su myi 'dzind to//
9a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos la chos yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa la 'dzind pa myed
9a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar rnaba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
9b1('bum): byin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi na pa'i rnam par shes pa la na ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin / de ni 'di ltam gA'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ byin
9b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
9b3('bum): kyi phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
9b4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rna ma par shes pa la yong su 'dzin pa myed phyi nang stong pa nyid kyil
9b5('bum): phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar myig ti/ 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/
9b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang
9b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
9b8('bum): phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sA'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i
10a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
10a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid
10a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
10a4('bum): nyid kyi phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongasasu myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te
10a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa mye da de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
10a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i 'dus
10a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin
10a8('bum): pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di
10b1('bum): ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
10b2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi 'dus
10b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang 'a
10b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams la sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa la
10b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir chu'i khams la chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams la yod sa su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
10b6('bum): kyi phyir mye'i khams la mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rlung gi khams la rlung
10b7('bum): gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams
10b8('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par la
11a1('bum): shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa la ma rig pa yongs
11a2('bum): su 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar 'du byed la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed la 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
11a3('bum): pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin
11a4('bum): pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mying dang ga zugs la mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
11a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched drug la skye mched drugayongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar reg pal yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa
11a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir reg pa la reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin to/
11a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar sred pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sred pa la sred pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar lend pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
11a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lend pa la lend pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar srid pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir srid pa la srid pa yongs
11b1('bum): su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi rang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lte ba la skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin de ni 'di ltar na shi la yongs sul
11b2('bum): 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rga shi la rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nangal
11b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de mi 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin
11b4('bum): pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ tshul khrims kyi pharalang tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di
11b5('bum): ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
11b6('bum): phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
11b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam
11b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de
12a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa
12a2('bum): myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyil
12a3('bum): phyir phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang
12a4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di lta ra stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
12a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongasasu myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chen po la
12a6('bum): stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir don dam pa stong
12a7('bum): pa nyid la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus
12a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// / de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus
12b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyil
12b2('bum): phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
12b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la la
12b4('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong panyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rang
12b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang ba zhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di
12b6('bum): ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin
12b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to//
12b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin to
13a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
13a2('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs
13a3('bum): su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
13a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'ji nang to// de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi na
13a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs
13a6('bum): su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
13a7('bum): yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams la
13a8('bum): yongs su 'dzind pa myed dephyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dbang po rnams la dbang po rnams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
13b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stobs rnams la stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
13b2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
13b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'
13b4('bum): mas sal la phags pa 'a ba dan rnaMrnas la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
13b5('bum): yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar bsamagatan rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam
13b6('bum): gtan rnams yongs su 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chad myed pa rnams la chad myed pa rnams yongs su myi
13b7('bum): 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
13b8('bum): pa rnams la/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
14a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rnam par tha rad pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
14a2('bum): pa rnams la yongs su myi 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par la
14a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de
14a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa mye da pa la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
14a5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rna/ mas la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang la
14a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong
14a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su myi 'dzind to// de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
14a8('bum): phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong
14b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin
14b2('bum): pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi 'jigs pa rnams la myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su la
14b3('bum): 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po la
14b4('bum): yongs su 'dzind pa myed de phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po
14b5('bum): la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po yongs su myi 'dzin to// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi la
14b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su myi
14b7('bum): 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad shes pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rgya
14b8('bum): 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
15a1('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin to/ de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la yongs su 'dzind pa myed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
15a2('bum): pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad la yongs
15a3('bum): su 'dzind pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslabs shing // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
15a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shingachos thams cad
15a6('bum): la yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15a7('bum): chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang myed par bya ba'i phyir bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor
15a8('bum): kyis smras patshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi
15b1('bum): skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / bla ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa kyi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong
15b2('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba'i
15b3('bum): skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'dri
15b4('bum): ba myi mthong 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel pa myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ra tshor ba tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so
15b5('bum): 'du shes kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nasanyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong
15b6('bum): stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing
15b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// 'du byed kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba
15b8('bum): myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed 'du byed kyi rang bzhin
16a1('bum): gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong
16a2('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 2bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
16a3('bum): pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs
16a4('bum): pa myi mthong rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ del
16a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig myig gi rang ba zhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong
16a6('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
16a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhem de ni 'di ltar na phan pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba kyi mthong
16a8('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
16b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga sA'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / brang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas
16b2('bum): nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
16b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar lce lce'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa
16b4('bum): myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sgo gas pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
16b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus lus kyi rang bzhi na gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong
16b6('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong
16b7('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid yid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong /
16b8('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi
17a1('bum): mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang
17a2('bum): pa myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel
17a3('bum): ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i sgra'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dri'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / ngo
17a4('bum): ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel
17a5('bum): ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dri'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// ro'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang
17a6('bum): ba myi mthong dor ba myi mthong / kun ras nyon mongs pa myi mthong/ rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
17a7('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ro ro'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg gi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong
17a8('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
17b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhen/ deni 'di ltar res reg gi rang bzhin gyis myed cing kyi dmyigs so// chol kyi skyeb kyi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong/ blangab kyi mthong / dor pa kyi ma
17b2('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir
17b3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos chos kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor
17b4('bum): ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel
17b5('bum): pa myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pa li rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna
17b6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong
17b7('bum): stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam
17b8('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
18a1('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste
18a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi
18a3('bum): mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
18a4('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi
18a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang
18a6('bum): ba myi mthong stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus
18a7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong /
18a8('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
18b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myil
18b2('bum): mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
18b3('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye
18b4('bum): ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs ma myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs
18b5('bum): pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i
18b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun
18b7('bum): nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir
18b8('bum): zhem/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong
19a1('bum): blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa
19a2('bum): myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te
19a3('bum): reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong ka kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi
19a4('bum): mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mtho pa/ 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus
19a5('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myil
19a6('bum): mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
19a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba
19a8('bum): myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri
19b1('bum): pa myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
19b2('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
19b3('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen
19b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chorabarna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i nga bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sA'i
19b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba myi mtho/ 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong
19b6('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthob/ 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te
19b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong
19b8('bum): 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'brib
20a1('bum): myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
20a2('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mtho ba/ blang ba myi mthong dor
20a3('bum): ba myi mthong kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
20a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigaso
20a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mtho pa dor ba myi mthong kun nas nyon mongs pa
20a6('bum): myi mthong rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar
20a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ra pa bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// /
20b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa'o// // sa'i khams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong
20b2('bum): blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
20b3('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams kyi skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa
20b4('bum): myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myil
20b5('bum): mtho 'grib pa myi mthong 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigaso
20b6('bum): mye'i khams kyi skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong rnam par byang ba myi mthong sogs pa
20b7('bum): myi mthong 'bri ba myi mthong 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so
20b8('bum): rlung gi khams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong rnam par byang ba myi mthong stsogs
21a1('bum): pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myil
21a2('bum): dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong /
21a3('bum): stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed
21a4('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa
21a5('bum): myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi ma thob/ 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen
21a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myil
21a7('bum): mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel
21a8('bum): be myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang
21b1('bum): bya myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste
21b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
21b3('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
21b4('bum): ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong
21b5('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi
21b6('bum): mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug gi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong
21b7('bum): blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel
21b8('bum): ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong
22a1('bum): blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
22a2('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg pa reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong
22a3('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
22a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sred pa'i skye ba myi ma/ thob/ 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong /
22a5('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba
22a6('bum): myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// lend pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor
22a7('bum): ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de
22a8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lend pa lend pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// srid pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor bal
22b1('bum): myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
22b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srid pa srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// skye ba'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / brang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas
22b3('bum): nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
22b4('bum): ltar skye ba skye ba'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rga shi'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi ma thong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong /
22b5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mtho pa/ 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste
22b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de mi 'di ltar rga shi na shi'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i spro ba kyi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong /
22b7('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
22b8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i skye ba myi
23a1('bum): mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myil
23a2('bum): mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed
23a3('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam
23a4('bum): par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mtho/ nga ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i
23a5('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i skye ba myi mthong
23a6('bum): 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthos/ stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi
23a7('bum): mthong 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so/
23a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myil
23b1('bum): mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ bsam
23b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
23b3('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
23b4('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag
23b5('bum): pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong
23b6('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar rab stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid
23b7('bum): kyi skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba
23b8('bum): myi mthong 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// phyi nang
24a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi
24a2('bum): mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so//
24a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong
24a4('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis
24a5('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi skye bamyi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong
24a6('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong
24a7('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi
24a8('bum): mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa
24b1('bum): nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas
24b2('bum): nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas
24b3('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
24b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/
24b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
24b6('bum): nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong
24b7('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
24b8('bum): gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa
25a1('bum): myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid
25a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myil
25a3('bum): mtho / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
25a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa
25a5('bum): pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong
25a6('bum): 'grib myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos thams
25a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi
25a8('bum): mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
25b1('bum): gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par
25b2('bum): byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong
25b3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa
25b4('bum): myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi ma thob/ 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'pha la ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
25b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi
25b6('bum): mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong
25b7('bum): 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye
25b8('bum): ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / bla ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong
26a1('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dngos
26a2('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs
26a3('bum): pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
26a4('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi
26a5('bum): mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi
26a6('bum): mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spyod pa
26a7('bum): rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong /
26a8('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis
26b1('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba
26b2('bum): myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi
26b3('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myil
26b4('bum): mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa gyi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
26b5('bum): dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams kyi skye ba myi mnapa/ 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba
26b6('bum): myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
26b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba skye mthong / 'gag pa kyi mthong / blang ba kyi mthong /
26b8('bum): ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / sogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i
27a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i skye
27a2('bum): pa myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong
27a3('bum): 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi skye ba myi
27a4('bum): mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong
27a5('bum): 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas
27a6('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong
27a7('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams
27a8('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon
27b1('bum): mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa
27b2('bum): rnams tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong /
27b3('bum): dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir
27b4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'drug pa rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so//
27b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi
27b6('bum): mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa
27b7('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong
27b8('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
28a1('bum): 'di ltar mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par
28a2('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong / kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong /
28a3('bum): rnam par byang ba myi mthong / stsogs pa myi mthong / 'bri ba myi mthong / 'grib pa myi mthong / 'phel ba myi mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
28a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin gyis myed cing myi dmyigs so
28a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba myi mthong / 'gag pa myi mthong / blang ba myi mthong / dor ba myi mthong // kun nas nyon mongs pa myi mthong / rnam par byang ba myi
