93b7('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gung na yang
93b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud nal
94a1('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin lce'i 'dus te reg gi chos nyid las kun na yang
94a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha'
94a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes
94a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'du sa te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos
94a5('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pamyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te
94a6('bum): reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yinayid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
94a7('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te
94a8('bum): reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
94b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes
94b2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba de bzhin nyid las gud na snga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
94b3('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
94b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg dpa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
94b5('bum): kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes
94b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
94b7('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gur na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tul
94b8('bum): phyi nang pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gung na yang shes
95a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
95a2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
95a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
95a4('bum): phyi nad pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
95a5('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
95a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mi yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i
95a7('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus
95a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tul
95b1('bum): phyi nang pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las kung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
95b2('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yid kyi
95b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do//
95b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyi da kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
95b5('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyi nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ yid
95b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// sa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sa'i khams
95b7('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
95b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
96a1('bum): tu phyind pa myed do// chu'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin chu'i khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// chu'i khams
96a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes
96a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mye'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
96a4('bum): mye'i khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyipa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin mye'i
96a5('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa myed do// mye'i khams kyi chos nyid da kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ mye'i
96a6('bum): khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang shes rab
96a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
96a8('bum): tu phyind pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do/
96b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin
96b2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi chos
96b3('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yinanam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i
96b4('bum): khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i zhes
96b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la sa gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do//
96b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
96b7('bum): ma rig pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin ma rig pa las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
96b8('bum): pa ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin ma rig pa'i chos
97a1('bum): nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ 'du byed las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
97a2('bum): tu phyind pa myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
97a3('bum): 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol
97a4('bum): tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las kud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// rnam par shes ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
97a5('bum): pa rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung ma yang shes rab kyi pharol tu phyinang pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par shes
97a6('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mying dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
97a7('bum): pa myed do// mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// mying dang /
97a8('bum): gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
97b1('bum): tu byi nad pa ma yin/ skye mched drug las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid
97b2('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
97b3('bum): pa myed do// reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
97b4('bum): ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// reg pa'i chos nyid kyi/ pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ reg pa'i
97b5('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
97b6('bum): tu byi nang pa myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gung nas ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa myed do// tshor ba'i
97b7('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sred pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
97b8('bum): sred pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
98a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// med pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sred pa'i chos nyid las grung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
98a2('bum): le nad pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lend pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa myed do// le nad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
98a3('bum): yin lend pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lend pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lend pa'i chos nyid las gud
98a4('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// srid pa yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin srid pa la sa gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do//
98a5('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// sring pa'i chos nyid kyang
98a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// skye ba la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ skye ba las
98a7('bum): gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu la
98a8('bum): phyi nad pa myed do// skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rga shi yang shes
98b1('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rga shi las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rga shi'i
98b2('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab
98b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
98b4('bum): phyi nad pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'
98b5('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// sbyin pa 'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyinang
98b6('bum): ba'i chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinas
98b7('bum): pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
98b8('bum): phyi nang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul
99a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i
99a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i
99a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
99a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtso na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang shes rab kyi pha
99a5('bum): ro la tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ brtsoni 'grus kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pi
99a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus
99a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// /
99a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
99b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu
99b2('bum): phyi nad pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes
99b3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
99b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de
99b5('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshe sa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
99b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyim pa'ar ba nyid las grangs malags rab kyi ros dun gyinang babyed do// songs nyid tu shes rab kyi pa 'os mabyin pa ma thong ba nyid las
99b7('bum): xxx
99b8('bum): rab kyis 'osapa byed mabyer ro// thoms nyid kyil pa nyid bya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ma yin rang song pa nyid kyim ma nyid las zung ma yang shes rabagyi ma ma sakyis
100a1('bum): myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las bud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// phyi stong pa la
100a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
100a3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
100a4('bum): pa ma yin phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyi/ da kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
100a5('bum): yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
100a6('bum): pa ma yin phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid
100a7('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
100a8('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos
100b1('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi phal
100b2('bum): rold tu phyind pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
100b3('bum): tu phyind pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
100b4('bum): myed do// dom dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong panyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
100b5('bum): pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi da kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ro// na dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
100b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes
100b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gung ma yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do
100b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// 'dus
101a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
101a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
101a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa
101a4('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yi ma 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gung ma yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do//
101a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa
101a6('bum): myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
101a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang
101a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes
101b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
101b2('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid o gakyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi la
101b3('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na
101b4('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de
101b5('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ dor ba myed
101b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gu ma yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las krung
101b7('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gung nal
101b8('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes
102a1('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha la
102a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
102a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
102a4('bum): rol tu phyinang pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
102a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
102a6('bum): kyi sas thang dus shes rabakyi rog kying babyud // myi ts+tsha nyi sa ba kyi rol na sbyid pa myi dbyigs pastong pa nyid las grangs
102a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
102b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang
102b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
102b3('bum): tu phyi nang pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las kung na yang shes rab
102b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos
102b5('bum): nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tubyi nang pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lam su
102b6('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
102b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab
102b8('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab
103a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
103a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos
103a3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dran
103a4('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dernams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
103a5('bum): ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhi na nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid
103a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi
103a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tul
103a8('bum): phyi nad pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
103b1('bum): tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yung shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
103b2('bum): yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
103b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin rtsal
103b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin dbang
103b5('bum): po rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinangapa myed do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dbang po rnas
103b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud
103b7('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/
103b8('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa myed do// stobs rnams
104a1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag
104a2('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de
104a3('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
104a4('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags
104a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan la ga brgyad pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu la
104a6('bum): phyi nad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud
104a7('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
104a8('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa la
104b1('bum): rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa la
104b2('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i
104b3('bum): bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams las
104b4('bum): gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi
104b5('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ bsam
104b6('bum): gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams las gud na yang
104b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
104b8('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
105a1('bum): myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang shes
105a2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
105a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
105a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chosanyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mye // rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha
105a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma yin rnam par tha rad pa rnam sa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
105a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par tha rang pa rnams kyi chos nyid la
105a7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
105a8('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mthar
105b1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang /
105b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
105b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang shes rab
105b4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do//
105b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
105b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
105b7('bum): smond pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
105b8('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do//
106a1('bum): mam lam mas rnams kya zhas sas kya gsalab kyal lalasas byan pa sa ma' b.rar/ lamag ya gas la rnams las gud ma yang shes las kyil lang tu blan pa mya dang // mngon
106a2('bum): bar shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes
106a3('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams
106a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin
106a5('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ting nge 'dzin
106a6('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang
106a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106a8('bum): byin pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgornams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
106b1('bum): ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
106b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
106b3('bum): ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes
106b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ de bzhin ka she/ gas pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa
106b5('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
106b6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
106b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
106b8('bum): phyind pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
107a1('bum): tu phyind pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid/
107a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// snying rje chen po yang shes rab kyi phal
107a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ snying
107a4('bum): rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa myed do// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i
107a5('bum): chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// sang sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
107a6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin
107a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
107a8('bum): pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
107b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ thams cad shes
107b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ thams
107b3('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
107b4('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi da kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/
107b5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
107b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shes rab
107b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
107b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
108a1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// /
108a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong zas brgyapa/ bam po / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gnas btum rab 'byor
108a3('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni che ba ste/ 'di ltar shes
108a4('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'o// btsun pa rab 'a byo rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni tshad myed pa ste/ 'di ltar
108a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
108a6('bum): tu phyin pa'o// de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
108a7('bum): kyis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par
108b1('bum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa rnams kyis mi dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so
108b2('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byas
108b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/
108b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dkyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka re re bzhinamo re de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108b5('bum): xxx
108b6('bum): tu phyi nang pa 'di mi chad dbyed pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste
108b7('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la bslabs shing rgyu rang tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
108b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tho bo 'tho bo thob
109a1('bum): 'gyur ro dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so
109a2('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byas
109a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
109a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a
109a5('bum): 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi/ ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so
109a6('bum): ke'u shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i
109a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'du shes rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
109a8('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myil
109b1('bum): dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di/
109b2('bum): ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
109b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyin
109b4('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myig rgya che ba'i phyi ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
109b5('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rna ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
109b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
109b7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sna rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
109b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar sna'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lce rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
110a1('bum): bo rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
110a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lus rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke
110a3('bum): shig de ni 'di ltar lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' gyi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shig yid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpal sems
110a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i
110a5('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang
110a6('bum): pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus mya dmyags/ dbus myi
110a7('bum): dbyigs so// ke'u shi kA sA rgyache ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ ke'u shi ka ro ni 'a
110a8('bum): ltar smra'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dri rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
110b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi
110b2('bum): ka ro rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i sngon gyi mtha' myi
110b3('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka reg rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che
110b4('bum): baM yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u
110b5('bum): shi ka chos rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
110b6('bum): ltar chos kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myig gi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
110b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
110b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi kan bi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
111a1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa/
111a2('bum): rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi
111a3('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
111a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi ma tha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
111a5('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lus kyi rnam par she sa pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
111a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka yid kyi rnam par
111a7('bum): shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya me ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de mi 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par
111a8('bum): shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
111b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myil
111b2('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
111b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus
111b4('bum): te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus
111b5('bum): te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems
111b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'
111b7('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
111b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus
112a1('bum): te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid
112a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang
112a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i sngon
112a4('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub
112a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
112a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub
112a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
112a8('bum): myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
112b1('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi
112b2('bum): dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
112b3('bum): 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi
112b4('bum): dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'irkyend kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya
112b5('bum): che ba yin te de ci'i phyir zhe nake'u shi ka de ni' de ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i sngonagyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
112b6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
112b7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka chu'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
112b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'
113a1('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mye'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin
113a2('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mye'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rlung gi khams
113a3('bum): rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi
113a4('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbu sa myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka nam mkha'i khams che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113a5('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha'
113a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin
113a7('bum): tede ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka ma
113a8('bum): rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon gyi
113b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' kyi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113b2('bum): 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka
113b3('bum): rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
113b4('bum): pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mying dang gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sos
113b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba na te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
113b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus kyi dmyigs so// ke'u shI ka skye mched drug rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di chu che ba yin
113b7('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka reg pa rgya
113b8('bum): che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' kyil
114a1('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka tshor pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
114a2('bum): tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so//
114a3('bum): ke'u shI ka sred pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i sngon
114a4('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka len pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs
114a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyi/ ra zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i sngon gyi ma tha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
114a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka srid pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
114a7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka skye ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
114a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
114b1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi karga shi rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
114b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems la
114b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
114b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
114b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi
114b6('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
114b7('bum): rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so//
114b8('bum): ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
115a1('bum): ka re ni 'di ltar brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka bsam
115a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam
115a3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems
115a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i sngon
115a5('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
115a6('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
115a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
115a8('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub seMs
115b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
115b2('bum): myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
115b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka chen po stong
115b4('bum): pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yi na te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di
115b5('bum): ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub
115b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
115b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'
115b8('bum): 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so/
116a1('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
116a2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
116a3('bum): nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong
116a4('bum): pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir
116a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed
116a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
116a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi
116a8('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
116b1('bum): rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so//
116b2('bum): ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
116b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir
116b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid
116b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma 'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// / ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir
116b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi'
116b7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa la spyod pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
116b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
117a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
117a2('bum): rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
117a3('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
117a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyi/ gas/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi
117a5('bum): dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
117a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka yang dag sna
117a7('bum): spong ba rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba'i
117a8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pol
117b1('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' phyi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs so//
117b2('bum): ke'u shi ka dbang po rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po'i sdon
117b3('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs khyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka stobs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/
117b4('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyi gas dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka bya
117b5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'/ de rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
117b6('bum): kA de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyi gas so// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam rgya che ba'i
117b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam gyi sngon gyi mtha' myi
117b8('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs s+ho// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
118a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyig
118a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
118a3('bum): ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub seMs
118a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi'
118a5('bum): dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbu sa myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
118a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
118a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin
118a8('bum): te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mthard kyis
118b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar
118b2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
118b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang // smon pa myed pa rgyache pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam
118b4('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so//
118b5('bum): ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
118b6('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
118b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzind kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
118b8('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
119a1('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rgya chel
119a2('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myil
119a3('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
119a4('bum): rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de mi 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so
119a5('bum): ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
119a6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po rgya che ba'i phyir
119a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rolal tu phyinang pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
119a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
119b1('bum): phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
119b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
119b3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya
119b4('bum): che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam
119b5('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma 'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rgya che ba'i
119b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sngon
119b7('bum): gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
