144a3('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di
144a4('bum): ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shri ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthalayas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
144a5('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma bya sa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so//
144a6('bum): ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke
144a7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
144a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so//
144b1('bum): ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
144b2('bum): 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
144b3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha'
144b4('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams
144b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
144b6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa
144b7('bum): stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs
144b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
145a1('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha'
145a2('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyil
145a3('bum): mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyinang
145a4('bum): pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi da kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka
145a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
145a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
145a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus
145a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
145b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
145b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka stobs mtha' yas
145b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus
145b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas
145b5('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
145b6('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam
145b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus kyi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i mden pa mthalams pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di
145b8('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir
146a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus
146a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
146a3('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146a4('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi
146a5('bum): dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par thard pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
146a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
146a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ral
146a8('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
146b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
146b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
146b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka ting nge
146b4('bum): 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ma za' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
146b5('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' ya sa pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
146b6('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs
146b7('bum): pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de
146b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
147a1('bum): phyi nad pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dbang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par
147a2('bum): rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par
147a3('bum): rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha'
147a4('bum): yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
147a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka da ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus
147a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i
147a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
147a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u
147b1('bum): shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
147b2('bum): 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
147b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka namal
147b4('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' pa dang tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang
147b5('bum): 'du shes mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas par @/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang // myig mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba mtha' yas pa dang
147b6('bum): sna mtha' yas pa dang / lce mtha' yas pa dang / lus mtha' yas pa pa dang / yid mtha' yas pa dang // gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skra mtha' yas pa dang / dri mtha' yas pa
147b7('bum): da / ro mtha' yas pa dang / reg mtha' yas pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa da
147b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang
148a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas
148a2('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te la
148a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lus kyi
148a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang // sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / chu'i
148a5('bum): khams mtha' yas pa dang / mye'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
148a6('bum): khams mtha' yas pa dang // ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / mying dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang / skyel
148a7('bum): mched drug mtha' yas pa dang / reg pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang / sred pa mtha' yas pa dang / len pa mtha' yas pa dang / srid pa mtha' yas pa dang /
148a8('bum): skye ba mtha' yas pa dang / rga shi mtha' yas pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
148b1('bum): tu phyi nad pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtha' yas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtha' yas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtha'
148b2('bum): yas pa dang // nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / chen po stong
148b3('bum): pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / mtha' las 'das
148b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma mye da pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
148b5('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha'ayas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas
148b6('bum): pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang // dran pa nye bar
148b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang
148b8('bum): stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' yas pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
149a1('bum): mthamams pa dang / thasam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang / mad byed pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam pam
149a2('bum): pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mthal
149a3('bum): pham pa dang / mngon par shes nas mtha' mas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthal
149a4('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthamams pa dang mo yang dag par rig pa pa'i mtha' mas pa dang / rnams pa chen po mtha la mas pa dang / ning rje chenapo
149a5('bum): mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rdo brgyad mtha' yas pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'dra sa bu mtha' yas pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
149a6('bum): 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang / rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
149a7('bum): nyid mtha' mas pa / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid mthalams pa'i myirna mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// k+Shesa? shi kA gzhan ya gyi
149a8('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brgya byin
149b1('bum): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga de rnam pa gang gis na dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas
149b2('bum): pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byorard kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
149b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang chos dmyigs
149b4('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
149b5('bum): pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byo/ rang de rnam pa gang gis na chos dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
149b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
149b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang dmyigs pa mtha'
149b8('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa
150a1('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor dade rnam pa gang gis na dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/ 'di ltar
150a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yin zhes bya// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmyigs pa mtha' yas so// dmyigs pa mtha' yas
150a3('bum): pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so// ke'u shi ka de bzhin nyid dang / dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/
150a4('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di mtha' yas so// brgya byin gyis smras pa
150a5('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor da de rnam pa gang gis na sems can mtha'ayas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin
150a6('bum): zhes bya/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
150a7('bum): pa rab 'byor nga de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ 'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du myi phu btags pa/ dngos
150a8('bum): po myed par mying du btags pa/ dmyigs pa myed par mying du btags pa'o// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
150b1('bum): sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myed do// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang
150b2('bum): myed pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod de ke'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te
150b3('bum): sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab
150b4('bum): 'byor da de ni myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na
150b5('bum): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas bang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang
150b6('bum): bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skyes pa dang bud myed du bcas pa dag gis/ lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ gang gnas la
150b7('bum): btan rab 'byor kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/ bstand pa'i chos
150b8('bum): 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do// kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub seMs dpa'
151a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o// chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis te/ gzugs
151a2('bum): sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ smra 'am/ dri'o
151a3('bum): ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam// myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am
151a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi
151a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus
151a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i
151a7('bum): khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par
151a8('bum): shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am// sbyin pa'i pha
151b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa
151b2('bum): 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am// nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong
151b3('bum): pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam
151b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/
151b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
151b6('bum): rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam
151b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
151b8('bum): rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo nas
152a1('bum): sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam byams pa chen po 'am snying rje chen po 'am
152a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam
152a3('bum): rang byang chub bam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis kyis kyang / theg pa
152a4('bum): gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/ gsum gang zhen 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
152a5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa lha'i bu dag de bzhin no// ji skad du smras pa de
152a6('bum): bzhin no// chos gang yang dmyigs su myed de/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am
152a7('bum): lce 'amalus sam/ yid dam// gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg kam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am
152a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
152b1('bum): pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am
152b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
152b3('bum): tshor ba 'am yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'am// sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam
152b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams sam// ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/
152b5('bum): tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am// sbyin pa'i pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
152b6('bum): pa 'am bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'am/ bas gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ nang
152b7('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/
152b8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam
153a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam
153a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam stobs
153a3('bum): rnams sam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams
153a4('bum): sam gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sa ma rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis ga nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam pa
153a5('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sa
153a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
153a7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams sam rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am
153a8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dam// chos gang la phyi dmyigs mod kyi theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/
153b1('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang myi
153b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
153b3('bum): pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la
153b4('bum): bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa las gzhan su yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// tshul ni rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gzhan du ya del
153b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i ba yang tu phyi nang pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
153b6('bum): phyi nad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi phal
153b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du
153b8('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa
154a1('bum): myi dmyigs so/ chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyig so/
154a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan duyang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das
154a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa
154a4('bum): nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhi na gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong
154a5('bum): pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyig sa so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du ya pa de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs
154a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las la
154a7('bum): gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las
154a8('bum): gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du yang
154b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// dbang po rnams las gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// byang chub
154b2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i
154b3('bum): bden pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams las gzhan
154b4('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du ya de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// rnam par la
154b5('bum): tha rad pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs
154b6('bum): pa myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// mngon par
154b7('bum): shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams las
154b8('bum): gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan
155a1('bum): du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de
155a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi'i
155a3('bum): dmyigs so// / thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs so//
155a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhi na gshegs pa myi dmyigs so//
155a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos 'di dag thams
155a6('bum): cad la slob ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin tu phyind pa la slob bo/ brtson 'grus
155a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la slob bo// nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// phyi stong pa
155b1('bum): nyid la slob bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo// don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// 'dus byas stong pa la
155b2('bum): nyid la slob bo/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
155b3('bum): la slob bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// dngos
155b4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob bo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ba bo/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo//
155b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo/ dbang po rnams la slob bo/ stobs rnams la slob bo/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
155b6('bum): la slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo/ bsam gtan rnams la slob bo// tshad myed pa rnams la slob bo
155b7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la slob bo/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo// rnam par ba ra pa'i
155b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la slob bo// / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob po/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob po
156a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob bo/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo// byams pa chen po la slob bo
156a2('bum): snying rje chen po la slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
156a3('bum): 'bras bu la slob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo// rang byang chub la slob bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob po// lha'i
156a4('bum): bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dang myi 'bral bar spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya
156a5('bum): ste/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mye ma dzad kyi zha ring byed cing / rgyal po'i khab pad mo yod pa'i
156a6('bum): nang gi tshong 'dus kyi dbus ma 'dug pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bzod pa'i pha rol
156a7('bum): tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// shes rab kyi pha
156a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// stong
156b1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rang to// chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//
156b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rad to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyurd to// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rad to// dor ba
156b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
156b4('bum): pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rang to// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rang to// ngo bo nyid
156b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyurang to// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyu rang to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to
156b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// stobs rnams dang bral bar
156b7('bum): ma gyur to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral ba
156b8('bum): ma gyur to// bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// tshad myed pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/
157a1('bum): rnam par thard pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
157a2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// gzungs kyi sgo
157a3('bum): rnams dang bral bar ma gyurang to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// myi 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
157a4('bum): dang bral bar ma gyu rang to/ byams pa chen po dang bra la bar ma gyur to// snying rje chen po dang bral bar mgyurang to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
157a5('bum): bral bar ma gyur te/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to// lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
157a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mang kyis ngas zhe'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs myed pa na bskal pa bzang po'i tshe 'jig rten gyi
157a7('bum): khams 'di nyid du shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyend pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
157a8('bum): rten mkhyend pa bla na myed pa/ skyes bu bdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
157b1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand to// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
157b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di/ de ltar gzugs myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du shes myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du
157b3('bum): byed kyi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi len gyi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig kyi len gyi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnab myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna myi len gyi 'dor
157b4('bum): ba'i tshul dang / lce myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzugs myi len myi 'dor ba'i
157b5('bum): tshul dang / sgra myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dri myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ro myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos
157b6('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi len myi gdor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi len myil
157b7('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul
157b8('bum): dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang
158a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
158a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi
158a3('bum): len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yid kyi
158a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i chul dang / sa'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mye'i khas
158a5('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi
158a6('bum): len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang // ma rig pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs
158a7('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / reg pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sred pa myi len myi'
158a8('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / len pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / srid pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / skye ba myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rga shi myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
158b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi len gyi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myi len gyi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul
158b2('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
158b3('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang // nang stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
158b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
158b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul da// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi len myi
158b6('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi
158b7('bum): len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
158b8('bum): pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
159a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spyod pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul
159a2('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / stobs rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byang chub
159a3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang
159a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi len myi
159a5('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul
159a6('bum): dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / ting
159a7('bum): nge 'dzin rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / myi
159a8('bum): 'jigs pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / snying rje chen
159b1('bum): po myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
159b2('bum): myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi len myi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
159b3('bum): mthun par yongs su 'dzind pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ba'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'
159b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang / mche ma'i lha'i bu dang / dka' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang /
159b5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhan
159b6('bum): bu dang / tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang / snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung snang gi lha'i bu dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /
159b7('bum): chung dge'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha'i bu dang / dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang / che ba'i lha'i bu dang / chung che'i lha'i bu dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'bras bu che ba'i
159b8('bum): lha'i bu dang / myi che ba'i lha'i bu dang myi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang / 'og myen gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par
160a1('bum): mkhyend nas/ de dag thams cad dpang du btsugs te lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge
160a2('bum): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
160a3('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
160a4('bum): kyi sems dang yang myi 'bral ba de dag ni bdud sdig can dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi
160a5('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shi nang tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba ste nga pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
160a6('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
160a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la grags myi rnyed smonang pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags kyi
160a8('bum): rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ myig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/
160b1('bum): sna stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid stong pa nyid
160b2('bum): shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed
160b3('bum): smond pa myed pas smond pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur
160b4('bum): sgra stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ro stod pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
160b5('bum): reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyurachos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis
160b6('bum): stong pa nyid la klag kyi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la grags myi rnyed/ smond pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la grags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang
160b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
160b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'du lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong
161a1('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid
161a2('bum): kyis stong pa nyid la grags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smon pa myed pas smond pa myed pa lags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang
161a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par la
161a4('bum): 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byi na kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
161a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis par bas par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyi da shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
161a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la grags kyi rnyed mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smonang pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la klags myi rnyed do//
161a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang
161a8('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
161b1('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis bslabs par 'gyur/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
161b2('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags
161b3('bum): myi rnyed smon pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/
161b4('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuramye'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
161b5('bum): 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byind kyi sa brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams s+ho/ A pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
161b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la grags myi rnyed mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed smonan pa myed pas smon pa myed pa la klags myi rnyed do//
161b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam
161b8('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis la
162a1('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/ reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sred pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin
162a2('bum): kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ len pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ srid pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs
162a3('bum): par 'gyur/ rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la rmA a myi rnyed mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed
162a4('bum): pa la glags myi rnyed smond pa myed pas smon pa myed pa dal glags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang mi rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
162a5('bum): phyi nad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyurar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyi da shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bzod
162a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ bsam gtan
162a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
162a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smond pa myed pas smond pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do//
162b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shing tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byi nang
162b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// grong sa sung nyid thongs nyid sto pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par la
162b3('bum): 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong sa
162b4('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis rlabs par 'gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
162b5('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs pa ra 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin
162b6('bum): tu byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par
162b7('bum): 'gyur/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid
162b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
163a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la grags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la glags myi rnyed/ smond pa myed pas smond pa myed pa la grags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar/
163a2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs
163a3('bum): par 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ dbang po rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu
163a4('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin
163a5('bum): kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la grags myi rnyed
163a6('bum): smond pa myed pas smond pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur
163a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ tshad myed pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa
163a8('bum): nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa nyid
163b1('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa
163b2('bum): rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//
163b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la grags myi rnyed/ smond pa myed pas smond pa myed pa la grags myi rnyed
163b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa'i
163b5('bum): rnams spyod pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyu ra so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa nyi da shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ byams
163b6('bum): pa chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis la
163b7('bum): brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la grags kyi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa lnga grags kyi rnyed/ smon pa myed pa
163b8('bum): smond pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do// de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ thams cad shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lam gyi rna
164a1('bum): pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
164a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags myi rnyed/ mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma myed pa la grags myi rnyed/ smond pa myed pas smonang pa myed pa la glags myi rnyed do// de ci'i
164a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis klags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / kang du grags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la grags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid rjed do// ke'u shi ka
164a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni myi 'am myi ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba dag gis glag sa rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
164a5('bum): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad la byam sa pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
164a6('bum): shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi nyam nga ba myi spongs pas dus byed par yang myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rig
164a7('bum): kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag par spang bas bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro// ke'u shig gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
164a8('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan
164b1('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
164b2('bum): lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ma zos pa dang / ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa/ de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o//
164b3('bum): gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan
164b4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed cing
164b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla ka ba myed pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung
164b6('bum): ste/ 'jigs pa'am sdang bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ nang stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi stong pa nyid
164b7('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// phyi nang stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// chen
164b8('bum): po stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// don dam pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms
165a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shi nang tu bsgoms so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shinang tu bsgoms so// thog ma dang tha
165a2('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shinang tu bsgoms so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shi nang tu bsgoms so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin
165a3('bum): tu bsgoms so/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shinang tu bsgoms so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shi nang tu bsgoms so// myi dmyigs pa'i
165a4('bum): stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shi nang tu bsgoms so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i
165a5('bum): tshul gyis shi nang tu bsgoms so/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shi nad tu bsgo mas so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
165a6('bum): rten gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs
165a7('bum): ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge' rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i sgra dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
165a8('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang
165b1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yid la bgyi ba dang / myi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun myi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
165b2('bum): par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na sems can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas rnams kyang rgyun chad
165b3('bum): par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ lha las phongs pa rnams kyang rgyu nad para'agyur/ myi las dbul ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i
165b4('bum): nad thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad cing 'jig pa dang / ma mchis par 'gyur// mu ge'i zhugs ngam thams cad kyang rgyun chad pa ra 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis
165b5('bum): na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ra 'gyur/ bsam gtan pani 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshad myed pa ba'i 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzugs myed
165b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
165b7('bum): phyi nad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind
165b8('bum): pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang
166a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
166a2('bum): bar 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thog ma dang
166a3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurador ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rten du 'byung
166a4('bum): bar 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung par 'gyur/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung par 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
166a5('bum): bar 'gyur/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyurar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung / bar 'gyur// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung
166a6('bum): bar 'gyur/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung
166a7('bum): bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

166b1('bum): 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig
166b2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
166b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
166b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po mchis na rgyal rigs che zhing mthob mchis par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis
166b5('bum): par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba mchis para'agyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams mchis par 'gyur/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur
166b6('bum): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gzhan 'phrul dbang
166b7('bum): byed kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshangs chen gyi
166b8('bum): lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung snang gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mchis par
167a1('bum): 'gyur/ dge' pa'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ chung dge'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ che ba'i

167a3('bum): mya gdung ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/ 'og myin gyi sgra rnams mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
167a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa mchis par 'gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ lan
167a5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid mchis par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa mchis

167b1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di/
167b2('bum): skad ces bka' stsa lad to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye

171b5('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa ga sum la 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
171b6('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug po thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
171b7('bum): 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar
171b8('bum): 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas to po nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa
172a1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa
172a2('bum): nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
172a3('bum): ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye
172a4('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dgad par spong ba rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phru dal gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang
172a5('bum): po rnams yongs su bzung ba 'gyur ba dang stobs rnams yongs su ba zung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

172a7('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
172a8('bum): rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spo nad pa myed pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung bar
172b1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs
172b2('bum): ba nam sa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
172b3('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang // rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur
172b4('bum): ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang rang byang chub yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam
172b5('bum): pa shes pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba yang ngo mtshar che'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
172b6('bum): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug po thams cad
172b7('bum): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyu ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro//
172b8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyuro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
173a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma da tha myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/
173a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs

173a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyu ro// de lnga dag lnga spong ba rnas yongasu bzung ba 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs yongasu bzung na
173a5('bum): dbang po rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// stob sa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
173a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// tshad
173a7('bum): myed pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// mthar
173a8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/
