205b2('bum): pa re lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/ rgyu nang tu zhugs par gyu rang pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod
205b3('bum): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i skad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga
205b4('bum): spangs pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom par gyur pa
205b5('bum): de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta/ bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu gling gi myi
205b6('bum): las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka re de bzhin no// de de bzhin te
205b7('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / chos la mos pa myi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa myi byed pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas la rnam
205b8('bum): rdu nur myed pa dang / chos la nem nur myed pa dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shi nang tu tonang pa dang / chos la shi nang tu rtonang pa dang / dge 'dun
206a1('bum): la shi nang tu rtond pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs par gyurd pa de lta bu/
206a2('bum): ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni
206a3('bum): ches nyung po/ de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'ang lta bu ni chas
206a4('bum): nyung ngo // de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyurang ba re lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas mthong /
206a5('bum): pa dang / chos mthos pa dang / dge 'dun snyen ma pa kur ba dang / sbyin pa ma byin pa dang / tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang
206a6('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha
206a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa thos ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
206a8('bum): rold tu phyind pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang // nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms
206b1('bum): ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zos ma bsgoms/
206b2('bum): pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
206b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgom
206b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /
206b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang
206b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / stobs rnams ma thos ma la
206b7('bum): bsgoms pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos
206b8('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms
207a1('bum): pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang mthard kyi su gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/
207a2('bum): dngamatshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / gzungs
207a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
207a4('bum): rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
207a5('bum): ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma zos ma bsgoms pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
207a6('bum): pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can las sangs rgyas la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang/ chos la mos pa myi byed
207a7('bum): pa dang ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la mos pa myi phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad thob pa
207a8('bum): ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo / de bas kyang mngon par shes
207b1('bum): pa drug thob pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dod chags dang
207b2('bum): zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa
207b3('bum): ches nyung ngo ngo/ de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
207b4('bum): par gyurang pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na myang ba ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ra gyur pa ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bsam pa dag pas
207b5('bum): byang chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka myi rnams lta zhog gi de ji snyam du sems dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs
207b6('bum): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so
207b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyun
207b8('bum): tu zhugs par gyurd pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir
208a1('bum): phyir myi 'ong bar gyurang pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ dgra bcom par gyur pa nyid dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig
208a2('bum): yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nem nur myed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la nem nur myed pa ni ji snyed
208a3('bum): cig yod/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las mar shes pa dang / par shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa la
208a4('bum): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / gso sbyin la ga na sa pa dang / 'dod pa la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing rnam dpar spyod pa dang / de bzhin du myi rtag par 'du shes pa dang
208a5('bum): bdag myed par 'du shes pa dang / myi gtsang bar 'du she/ sa pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba myed par 'du shes pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ 'dzam bu
208a6('bum): 'i gling gi srog chags las bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod// brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gi srog
208a7('bum): chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
208a8('bum): 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/ rgyu nang tu zhugs par gyu rad pa dang
208b1('bum): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyur pa dang /
208b2('bum): bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du dgra bcom par gyu rang pa dang / rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shi nang tu nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las bla na
208b3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de bzhin no/
208b4('bum): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum thob
208b5('bum): pa dang / rnam par tha ra pa brgyad thob pa dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / mngon
208b6('bum): par shes pa drug thob pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa thob pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/ lan
208b7('bum): cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir myi 'ong bar gyurang pa dang / bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/
208b8('bum): dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ de bas gang dra
209a1('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa'i de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa
209a2('bum): de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can
209a3('bum): tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir
209a4('bum): myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
209a5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam bzhan pa/ mo sa pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams
209a6('bum): kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad
209a7('bum): myed grangs myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis
209a8('bum): shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las phal cher nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa lnga/
209b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ le lo can/ bcom 'grus myed pa/ bsam pazhan pa/ mos pa dpa' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas
209b2('bum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
209b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas de la gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las phal
209b4('bum): cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka p+la na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ le
209b5('bum): lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pazhand pa mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'tshal ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas
209b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
209b7('bum): byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang gyi ldan pas/ de las gcig gas gnyis shig phyir gyi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ del
209b8('bum): phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ bcom/
210a1('bum): 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhand pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
210a2('bum): bsgribs pa myed pas/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
210a3('bum): chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher
210a4('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka p+la na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ le lo can
210a5('bum): brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pa zhand pa mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs
210a6('bum): rgyas kyi sman bsgribs pa myed pas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klang gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
210a7('bum): byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig kam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de la phal cher
210a8('bum): nyan thos dparang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus
210b1('bum): myed pa/ bsam pazhand pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chalang ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ ltol
210b2('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab
210b3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang /
210b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed
210b5('bum): pa bas mi po zhand pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed
210b6('bum): pas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /
210b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang /
210b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam
211a1('bum): zhand pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bslab par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa myed pas/ 'og gi phyogs
211a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can chad myed zangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i thabs
211a3('bum): mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/ de las phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba
211a4('bum): mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bla na mye ra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ le lo can brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pazhand pa/ mos pa
211a5('bum): dma' ba shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis basmA ba par dka'o// ke'u shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan pa sgribs pa myed pas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
211a6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'i thabs
211a7('bum): mkhas pa dang myi ldan pas/ de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de bas phal cher nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur
211a8('bum): ba mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhem/ ke'u shi ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/ brtson 'grus myed pa/ bsam pazhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba
211b1('bum): shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa
211b2('bum): de dag/ sbyar zhing bde bar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal bar 'dod na/ yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di la mnyan
211b3('bum): bar bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di gzung zhing bcang
211b4('bum): ba dang / klag cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yi nga la bya zhing bris te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
211b5('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pa da na mang pos rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu ru/ da du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// dge ba'i chos gang ji
211b6('bum): snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/ de dag kyang gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste
211b7('bum): 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
211b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid du/
212a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
212a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
212a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
212a4('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phag/ sa pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
212a5('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'drug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
212a6('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
212a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gang ji snyed
212a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
212b1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par gyur na te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
212b2('bum): rol tu phyinang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / sbyin
212b3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
212b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
212b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong panyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong
212b6('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
212b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bzhin pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/
212b8('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge
213a1('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
213a2('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa dag la bslab pa mdzad kyis bdag cag
213a3('bum): gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni bdag cag gi stonang pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad myed pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston
213a4('bum): pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa bstand pa'o// rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang
213a5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstand pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di la slob slob pa dang
213a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
213a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa
213a8('bum): nyid la slob slob pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
213b1('bum): la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba
213b2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang
213b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spong
213b4('bum): slob pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po
213b5('bum): rnams la slob slob pa dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob sgo ba pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
213b6('bum): slob slob pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
213b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang rnam par tha rang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par ba rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/
213b8('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob
214a1('bum): slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /
214a2('bum): byams pa chen po la slob skyob pa dang snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam
214a3('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na mas dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa
214a4('bum): rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kya/ nga pha rold tu phyind par gyur to/ pha rol tu phyi nang to/
214a5('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyu ra ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung
214a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la brtan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a7('bum): pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
214a8('bum): de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
214b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la la
214b2('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
214b3('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i
214b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye
214b5('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
214b6('bum): 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis
214b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
214b8('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nang
215a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
215a2('bum): gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
215a3('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
215a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tham sa cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin
215a5('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
215a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong
215a7('bum): pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
215a8('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don du
215b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten
215b2('bum): yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
215b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de
215b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin
215b5('bum): lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin/ no// de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka la
215b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ swa dang / rtsi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
215b7('bum): kyi rten yin no// de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma skyed pa stong pa nyid la btam par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ kelpa shi ka thogs dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
215b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rtem yin te/ lha dang / kyi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya'o/
216a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang
216a2('bum): myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang
216a3('bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa
216a4('bum): nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka cho sa thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216a5('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i
216a6('bum): bIr zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / rtsi dang / lham
216a7('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
216a8('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
216b1('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
216b2('bum): lha dang / rtsi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /
216b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / rtsi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rtem yin no// de dag gis dngos po myed pa'i
216b4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
216b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin ro// de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
216b6('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
216b7('bum): lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan
216b8('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis
217a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs
217a2('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis dbang po rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po
217a3('bum): 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag
217a4('bum): gis stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
217a5('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bya nga chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtan par bya ste/
217a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang /
217a7('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di
217a8('bum): ngag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
217b1('bum): de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
217b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
217b3('bum): ke'u shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skyel
217b4('bum): dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad myed pa na mas la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshad myed pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang
217b5('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / rmyi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
217b6('bum): de dag gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brton par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /
217b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar
217b8('bum): pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
218a1('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i
218a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
218a3('bum): lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
218a4('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'di dag ni nyan thosadang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
218a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/
218a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang /
218a7('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
218a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// dang dag gas rang bzhan gshegs pa stabs rnams
218b1('bum): daca' phyar zhe na/ de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs/
218b2('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir
218b3('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang
218b4('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos/
218b5('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
218b6('bum): de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
218b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i
218b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma
219a1('bum): yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
219a2('bum): pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// /
219a3('bum): de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
219a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha pa/ myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtan par bya/
219a5('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan tho sa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
219a6('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
219a7('bum): ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin/
219a8('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
219b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
219b2('bum): kis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'dus nas/ mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'bang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rtsar dpag tshad byed pa byas te/ de la rnam
219b3('bum): 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi ma ba
219b4('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtsham dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / rdzas kyi sis snyanabapos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas
219b5('bum): drung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la dzi snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig sa kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/
219b6('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol dbu/ bcom ldan 'das sang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol dpa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
219b7('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyimed pa 'i'i bris gling 'dzin pa dang / cang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par bye rnas bzhin du me sa zeng ba ga'anas
219b8('bum): rgya chem ston cing / rnam pa thams cad ma khye rang pa nyid kyi sems dang kyi 'bral pa gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / bre ma dang / maba'a' dang / gdugs dang /
220a1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bu dung du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo//
220a2('bum): ke'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir
220a3('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam sa/ rgyar dpag chad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
220a4('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas dkyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi cho sa gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi
220a5('bum): gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas
220a6('bum): mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
220a7('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
220a8('bum): pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid kyi sems dang myi 'bral la/
220b1('bum): gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu
220b2('bum): dung du byed mchod par byed na/ bsod nas ches mang du 'phel lo/ ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te'
220b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas
220b4('bum): pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang
220b5('bum): lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal
220b6('bum): mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi pa dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i
220b7('bum): phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
220b8('bum): bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka re bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
221a1('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
221a2('bum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ pu rung du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
221a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
221a4('bum): nas mchod pa'i phyir stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du da pag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su
221a5('bum): bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi metog dang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos da nga/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /
221a6('bum): lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir
221a7('bum): byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa
221a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
221b1('bum): phyi nad pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
221b2('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod
221b3('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
221b4('bum): bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las
221b5('bum): byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag chad byed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng
221b6('bum): ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang
221b7('bum): lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu rung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bul
221b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
222a1('bum): ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
222a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/
222a3('bum): bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la
222a4('bum): gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
222a5('bum): mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte na gi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas
222a6('bum): yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lga rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi la
222a7('bum): chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir
222a8('bum): byas pu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam// brgya byin gyis gsol pa
222b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222b2('bum): phyi nang pa 'di 'dzin par byed 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang /
222b3('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ pu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel/
222b4('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
222b5('bum): rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag lasasems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che
222b6('bum): sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas te/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi la
222b7('bum): spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba
222b8('bum): ngan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ phu rud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha
223a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyil
223a2('bum): sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
223a3('bum): kyis rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ bya dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so//
223a4('bum): bde bar gshegs pa de lags te bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dung du bgyis pa dang /
223a5('bum): mchod par bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang / me byon pa da nga da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rim gror bgyis
223a6('bum): pa dang / bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed
223a7('bum): cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad

223b6('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis bu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig

224a1('bum): pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/

224a3('bum): pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar

224a6('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis pu dung du bgyis mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
224a7('bum): bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i srad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i

225b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
