226a3('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang
226a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyi rna ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang
226a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang / bsam ga tan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
226a6('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las la
226a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
226a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par
226b1('bum): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
226b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang ba myed pa gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang
226b3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
226b4('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang // ces
226b5('bum): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/
226b6('bum): de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind par
226b7('bum): gyur to// phyi nang to// phyi nad par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu dgu pa'o//
226b8('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya
226'a1('bum): byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// gang gis
226'a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi nang pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du me tog dang /
226'a3('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu rung
226'a4('bum): du byas/ mchod par byas ma de'i phyir rigs kyi bu la/ ma rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad myed/ grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed
226'a5('bum): dpag tu myed par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke 'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
226'a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
226'a7('bum): pa las byung ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba
226'a8('bum): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid
226'b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni stong pa nyid
226'b2('bum): stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
226'b3('bum): las byung ba ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa las byung ba ni mtha' las 'das pa
226'b4('bum): stong pa nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byu nga ba ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni dor ba myed pa stong pa
226'b5('bum): nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni ra nga bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// shes
226'b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba
226'b7('bum): ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//
226'b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227a1('bum): phyi nad pa las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni dbang po rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni stobs
227a2('bum): rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes
227a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni tshad
227a4('bum): myed pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni rnam par thar
227a5('bum): pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung
227a6('bum): ba ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol
227a7('bum): tu byind pa las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs
227a8('bum): pa'i stobs rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//
227b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas
227b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni sems can yongs su
227b3('bum): sbyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las la
227b4('bum): byung ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
227b5('bum): pa las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg/ pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni
227b6('bum): theg pa chen po'o// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
227b7('bum): sa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di bris ste/ glegs pas du byas shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du ming la byed
227b8('bum): cing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur
228a1('bum): bstir byas/ phu dud du bya sa/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o//
228a2('bum): stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya zag stong gis dgrangs da mad/ bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// rgyang yang nye bar
228a3('bum): myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro// chos dkon la
228a4('bum): mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mcho ga nub par myi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bas
228a5('bum): gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams 'jig
228a6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu
228a7('bum): phyi nang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam
228a8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi
228b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar/
228b2('bum): 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
228b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyur
228b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
228b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
228b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
228b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
228b8('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
229a1('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chang myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
229a2('bum): rnam par tha rang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
229a3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs
229a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
229a5('bum): 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig/ rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten
229a6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes
229a7('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
229a8('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten
229b1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyuro/ dga' ldan kyi su nas 'dzig rten du 'byung ba 'bru'o chus dag A ne sa 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyur ro//
229b2('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
229b3('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor ki lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung sngang
229b4('bum): gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad skye nga snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
229b5('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
229b6('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed che ba'i lha
229b7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi gdung ba'i lha rjes 'jig
229b8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig
230a1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnaMs
230a2('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do//
230a3('bum): bla na myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum
230a4('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtsha ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi
230a5('bum): lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rna mas dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs
230a6('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gyi lha rnams dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /
230a7('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha rnas
230a8('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi che ba'i lha rnams dang / myi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed yod
230b1('bum): pa de dag la/ spu'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gzung bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bcang bar bya'o// grogs
230b2('bum): po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa klag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//
230b3('bum): grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad
230b4('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro/ dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// grogs po ngag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/ grogs po dag chos
230b5('bum): kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyu/ nam chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
230b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha
230b7('bum): rol tu phyi nang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid
230b8('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
231a1('bum): 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
231a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig
231a3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
231a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'ji garten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong panyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong
231a5('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
231a6('bum): 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'bung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
231a7('bum): stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bags pa'i lam san lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
231a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad byed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs
231b1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig
231b2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
231b3('bum): 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
231b4('bum): 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten
231b5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dra sa pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
231b6('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro/
231b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de
231b8('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par bris
232a1('bum): shig/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing / sum
232a2('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang zab mo bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang mtsham bsngal lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha
232a3('bum): ton gyis shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems skyed pa de dag spos shig/ rnam par 'phel bar myi 'gyur ro/
232a4('bum): lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang / ke'u shi ka/ khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
232a5('bum): pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes ra ba kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pas lha'i gnas
232a6('bum): de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/
232a7('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthard kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
232a8('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
232b1('bum): dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// ma byon
232b2('bum): ba'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
232b3('bum): nyid la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs
232b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shi pa 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha
232b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
232b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/
232b7('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o//
232b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rigs snga gas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni myil
233a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o//
233a2('bum): dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni rigs
233a3('bum): sngags chen mo'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rigs sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni myi mnyam pa dnga'
233a4('bum): mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
233a5('bum): ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / rigs sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon
233a6('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang / rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa rdzogs
233a7('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
233a8('bum): ngag kyang / rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig sngags
233b1('bum): 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
233b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
233b3('bum): pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa
233b4('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
233b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa nyid 'jig
233b6('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
233b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig
233b8('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid
234a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par
234a2('bum): spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub
234a3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa
234a4('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin mthar da kyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yi na rnam par tha rad za'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
234a5('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yo da pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
234a6('bum): yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang
234a7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten
234a8('bum): na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na song ba yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig
234b1('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon myed pa nyid 'jig
234b2('bum): rkyen na yod pa yin/ myig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir
234b3('bum): gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na song ba yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten ma yod pa yin
234b4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'jig rtend na yod pa yin
234b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
234b6('bum): lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na ka dgas su yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i
234b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod
235a1('bum): pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
235a2('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdags su 'a
235a3('bum): yod pa yin// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na ka dgas su yod pa yin phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin
235a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin
235a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig
235a6('bum): rten na gad nu yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten ma gdag su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten ma gdag su yod pa yin
235a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na kadags su yod pa
235a8('bum): yin/ nga dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags
235b1('bum): su yod pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na/
235b2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su
235b3('bum): yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par tha rang pa rnams
235b4('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
235b5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'jig rten na gang gas su yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten
235b6('bum): na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags pa yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs
235b7('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa
235b8('bum): nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin// rgyu nad
236a1('bum): tu zhugs pa 'jig rten ma gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'jig rten ma gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa
236a2('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten nu gdags su yod pa
236a3('bum): yin no// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i da kyil 'khor yod na rtsi dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i
236a4('bum): dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang / yang nga/ ga pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
236a5('bum): 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu byi nang ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa dang
236a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par tharang ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so mo yang
236a7('bum): dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang
236a8('bum): gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung
236b1('bum): pa de'i sems nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
236b2('bum): las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
236b3('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan
236b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro// de lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa
236b5('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa
236b6('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong
236b7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
236b8('bum): la spong ba dang / dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / drang pa nye bar gzhag
237a1('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /
237a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / chad
237a3('bum): myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod
237a4('bum): ba dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang ba myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
237a5('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la s+ho da pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang
237a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang // nyan thos kyi sar myi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas
237a7('bum): kyis mngon tu myi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa dang / che phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang
237a8('bum): sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
237b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa rjes su thob par byung ba'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa las byung bar rig par bya'o// ki'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
237b2('bum): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs
237b3('bum): gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
237b4('bum): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba lag sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u
237b5('bum): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de
237b6('bum): sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyind pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// skyes dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par myi 'gyur ba nas
237b7('bum): nang brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang bla nas gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di kha ton tu byed cing
237b8('bum): rgyal po'i pho brang du song na de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags myi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems so// /
238a1('bum): dro'i phyir zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di nyid kyi ga'i maSh+Tas de sar sem 'o// gas te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu so / shes rab kyil ro
238a2('bum): byirang pa 'di 'a tor byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de rgyal po'i bu'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing / dka' bar bya bar
238a3('bum): sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag/ snying rje'i sems da
238a4('bum): dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha ros tu byi dang pa 'di 'dzin pa
238a5('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub parabyed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni tshe 'di'i yon tu na de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan
238a6('bum): kyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste nas yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi sam rnams dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / chang myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed
238a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyi nang pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
238a8('bum): dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad byed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed
238b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
238b2('bum): ba myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
238b3('bum): bar rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su sbyinang par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang seMs
238b4('bum): can dmyal bar myi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su myi ste/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du myi skye'o// de rnam nga yan lag nyams pa can du myi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i
238b5('bum): rigs su myi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag da rang pa 'am/ shen pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam
238b6('bum): dmangs rigs su myi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chang bar myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba'i
238b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / phyag
238b8('bum): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sems can
239a1('bum): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun nub par bya/ tshul ba'i du ming la byu/ rnas pa bams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dpas bral bar byas te
239a2('bum): dedag din mthar byed pasang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dum 'di'i yon tan dang / se rabs gan byo son tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes pa
239a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu'o//
239a4('bum): sa sa / com du'adas pa logs su dong ba dang / de nas pa'i dbang po
239a5('bum): byid 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ chu legs pa na gzhan dang / kun tu rtsub brgya po gags lta ba'i bsam bcad 'di dag bcos snga 'das gabar ba der dong ra/ de la bdag gis ci sa
239a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyis rol tu byid pa brjod pas/ mu thegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgya ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dobadas/ bar chad byed par myi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das pa
239a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa 'di las mi snyed cig bzung ba de dag 'a ton du bya'o snyam nas/ denas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed bcu
239b1('bum): pa de dag kha ton du brjod do// de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo //
239b2('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyub de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid du
239b3('bum): sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal
239b4('bum): pal/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par bsams pas de'i phyi/ ra mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag
239b5('bum): rgyang ring po ring po nas pal g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs cas gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag
239b6('bum): las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu chub 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa grags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/
239b7('bum): 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na
239b8('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bstanang pa'i tshezhe sdang ba'i sems sam/ grags blta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa
240a1('bum): ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
240a2('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye bar dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / mang myed snang ba dang / dge ba dang / rlung dge dang
240a3('bum): tshang myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / chang myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nang tu mthong ba dang / gya rom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha
240a4('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed ci yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rosang tu phyi rang ba 'di so
240a5('bum): su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
240a6('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por

240a8('bum): ba 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ba'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ga stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgam/

242a7('bum): de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
242a8('bum): ba der 'gro 'dod par 'gyur ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyurar to// kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing
242b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la/ bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po bim 'bi sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par
242b2('bum): bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod/ rgyal po sde rab 'pham byed dang / shag kya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod de/ bdud sdig
242b3('bum): to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing glags tshol sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang brtse ba'i bsam pa can gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi
242b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran par brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yang
242b5('bum): dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa
242b6('bum): de lta de ltar/ bdud sdig to can de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir log go// de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og myin gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa
242b7('bum): de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di
242b8('bum): skad du brjod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha
243a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring
