243a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni mgor dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o//
243a7('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og myin gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'i kA re de bzhin no// de de bzhin no// lha'i bu dag re rel
243a8('bum): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
243b1('bum): rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
243b2('bum): dang / phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang
243b3('bum): yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa lung bar du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro
243b4('bum): phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa 'di bris shing glegs pam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par
243b5('bum): ngas shes so// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mu na ba dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu ded ga gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas
243b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di
243b7('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du met+pa la bab+h+ring pa de la/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha grags tshol ba rnams
243b8('bum): kyis glags myi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun myi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang pa bgyi'o//
244a1('bum): de ci'i skang du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun nub par bgyid pa dang / rdul bzhin
244a2('bum): du yid la bgyid pa de 'i stond pa 'am/ stonang pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// @
244a3('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de
244a4('bum): ngag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa 'di 'dzin cing 'am
244a5('bum): ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang nus bzhin du mengs bgying ba de dag sa sngon gyi rgyabal bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
244a6('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni
244a7('bum): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo kang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang po dang klog
244a8('bum): cing kur chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhes
244b1('bum): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol
244b2('bum): tu phyinang pa btsal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
244b3('bum): lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / rnam pa thams cadal
244b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'astsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de
244b5('bum): bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa
244b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las byung ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
244b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang gzhan
244b8('bum): ma yin te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
245a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gcig pa//
245a2('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa/ de ltar smir
245a3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i mying yang mo ngas su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu
245a4('bum): byind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan
245a5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes ra bkyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i phyir yang yongs su brjod pa
245a6('bum): ma mdzad// de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gyi stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang
245a7('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
245a8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mying
245b1('bum): yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa
245b2('bum): ma mdzad/ de ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid
245b3('bum): kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad
245b4('bum): de ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pas mang desar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdad/ deg drang pos
245b5('bum): po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i phying yongs su
245b6('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad pa de ltar/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad
245b7('bum): de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mngad/ de ltar dbang po rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stobs rnams kyi phying yang yongs su
245b8('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mal
246a1('bum): mdzad do// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma la
246a2('bum): mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshad myed pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzugs myed pa'i
246a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ rnam par thard pal
246a4('bum): brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/
246a5('bum): ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams
246a6('bum): kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgro rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//
246a7('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa mi mdzad pa de ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
246a8('bum): gyi 'jigs pa bzhi'i phyir yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mying yang yongs su brjod pas mdzang/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i sgrings pa yongs su
246b1('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dga' bo de ji
246b2('bum): snyam du sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyinang pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud dang / 'phags pa'i
246b3('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
246b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i spro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
246b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
246b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o// kun tu 'dren pa'o// dga' bo de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin
246b7('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad
246b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis la
247a1('bum): bka' stsal da pa/ de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyer bu nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa y-in nas/ gsolang pa
247a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson
247a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
247a4('bum): pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
247a5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu
247a6('bum): byind pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin
247a7('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags rnam pa thams
247a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson
247b1('bum): 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags
247b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo
247b3('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
247b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yod sa su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam
247b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
247b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thos
247b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
247b8('bum): nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni
248a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi
248a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// myi skyel
248a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
248a4('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin/ myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
248a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma'
248a6('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags
248a7('bum): ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul khrims kyi pha
248a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa lags ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pi bzod pa
248b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos/
248b2('bum): ba'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
248b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / phyi
248b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rnas pa thams cad mkhye pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
248b5('bum): stsal pa/ gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i
248b6('bum): rdul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // myig gnyis su skyed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyis su myed
248b7('bum): ba'i tshul dang / sras gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyis su myed pa'i nus dang// gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sku gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su myod
248b8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su myod pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang
249a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sde'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam
249a2('bum): par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su
249a3('bum): byed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
249a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i
249a5('bum): tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyi sa su myed pa'i rdul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus
249a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // sa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chu'i las
249a7('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i rdus dang / rnam par shes pa'i
249a8('bum): khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // ma rig pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs
249b1('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang
249b2('bum): len pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / srid pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa gnyis su
249b3('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis
249b4('bum): sku myed pa'i tshus dang / bsam gtan gyis 'o byinang pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
249b5('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis
249b6('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus
249b7('bum): sa byas spyong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stod pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dor pa
249b8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
250a1('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis/
250a2('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis/
250a3('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan
250a4('bum): lag rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang
250a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i
250a6('bum): tshul dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
250a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang /
250a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su myong ba'i tshul dang
250b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // rgyun tu zhugs
250b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su
250b3('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis
250b4('bum): sum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma sna'i sa pa'i tshul dang / de ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
250b5('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa shes pa gnyis sus mtshapa'i tshul dang // ji ltar myig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar na ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
250b6('bum): ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma lachis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar
250b7('bum): gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar res
250b8('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis
251a1('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi rnam par
251a2('bum): shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i
251a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
251a4('bum): ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
251a5('bum): tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis
251a6('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
251a7('bum): ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang
251a8('bum): ji ltar mye'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes
251b1('bum): pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su mchis
251b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mying dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba
251b3('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba
251b4('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rga shi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi
251b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i/ tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis
251b6('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar nang stong pa
251b7('bum): nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
251b8('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis
252a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed
252a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thos
252a3('bum): cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos
252a4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji daltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
252a5('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa na mas gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
252a6('bum): sngar du 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su marnyis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bya/
252a7('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis
252a8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan nas gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshad myed pa rnaMs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs gnyi su ma
252b1('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lta mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dri ltar rnam
252b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnaMs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting
252b3('bum): nge 'dzin rnas gnyis sum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgornams gnyis sum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis sus mdzes pa'i tshul dang /
252b4('bum): ltar gyi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su mi mchisapa'i nus dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis
252b5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang
252b6('bum): ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
252b7('bum): tshum dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul da de ltar las phyinas pa shes pa nyid gnyis sus mchis pa'i rdul dang / ji ltar ras pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su la sa
252b8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags//
253a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ 'di ltar gzugs
253a2('bum): ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang / pha rol tu phyidad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// tshor bar tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyi
253a3('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dang
253a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar/ myed do// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyind
253a5('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rna ma par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang / pha rol da
253a6('bum): tra phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar skyed do// myig ni stsog gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dri ltar myig drang pha rol tu phyi nud bu 'di dag gnyis su skyed de gnyis sku
253a7('bum): byar myed do// na ba ni rna bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// snga ni sngas stong ste/ de ci'i
253a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lce ni lus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyi nad pa
253b1('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
253b2('bum): yid na yid kyis stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na//
253b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// s+tha ni smras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'angadi dag gnyis
253b4('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dran dros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
253b5('bum): ro ni ris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ro dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// reg ni reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir/
253b6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// chos ni chos kyis sbyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyin
253b7('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni srog gi rnam par shes pas spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol
253b8('bum): tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
254a1('bum): dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sde'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam
254a2('bum): par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyidad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sre'i rnam par shes pa ni sI'i rnam par shes pas spyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sde'i rnam par shes
254a3('bum): pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhes/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes
254a4('bum): dang pha rol tu phyidad pa 'di dag gnyis su med deg su byur byed do// yid kyi rnas par shes pa ni yi kyi rnas pa shes pas song / de ci'i phyir zhen/ deni 'di mar
254a5('bum): yid kyi dam par shes pa dang pha ros du phyi dad pa 'di dag ga mu myed de gnyis su byar med do// rtsege gi 'dus te re ga pa 'i smig gi 'dus te reg pas spyod/ deci'i phyir na
254a6('bum): de 'di skang mig gi 'dus ga pa dang pha roladu tu phyirnyed pa 'di dag gnyis sa med de gnyis sa thar byed do// na pa'i 'dus te reg pa na pa'i 'dus te reg pas spong
254a7('bum): nen/ de ni 'di sa nga pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas spyod ste/ deci'i phyir
254a8('bum): nes/ de 'di sar ma'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// sde'i 'dul te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas spong / debo'i phyi
254b1('bum): zhes/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste
254b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas spong
254b3('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni myig gi
254b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyi/ ra zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba dang / pha rol du phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su
254b5('bum): myed de gnyis su byur myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis rabs stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i
254b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas
254b7('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
254b8('bum): tshor ba ni mye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
255a1('bum): sakyang byed do// mas kyi 'dus te rkyen kyis tshor ba 'i grus kyi dus te ga pa rkyen kyis rdzo pas spyong / phyi nes/ de ng+ges dasus kyi nas kyi
255a2('bum): kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas sbyong ste/ de
255a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis srung ste/
255a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol da phyi nad pa 'ang dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis skyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
255a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag ga nyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// sde'i khams nam+b+ha 'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhes/ de ni 'dis
255a6('bum): kye'i khams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams dang
255a7('bum): pha rol tu phyidad pa 'di dag gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// nam mal 'i khams ni nam mkha'i 'ams kyis stong de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta rnam sa kha'i khams dang
255a8('bum): rol na tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams nirnam par shes pa'i khams kyis so non kyi dede ni 'dis pharnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
255b1('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis
255b2('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par
255b3('bum): shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// mying dang gzugs ni mying dang
255b4('bum): gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ myang dang gzugs dang / pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug ni skye mched
255b5('bum): drug gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ma mched drug dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/
255b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol
255b7('bum): tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sred pa na sred pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed//
255b8('bum): do// len pa ni len pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhes
256a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
256a2('bum): dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// nang stong pa nyid ni
256a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid
256a4('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyi dad dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
256a5('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid pa pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su bya ra byed do// sto ba nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
256a6('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa'i stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong sa
256a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/
256a8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol du phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/
256b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste
256b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
256b3('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni/
256b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol du phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/
256b5('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu
256b6('bum): phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed da gnyis su byar myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
256b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
256b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
257a1('bum): 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong
257a2('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong
257a3('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo/
257a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dngos
257a5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni la de ltar dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / pha rol
257a6('bum): tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams /
257a7('bum): dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par
257a8('bum): spong ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
257b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dbang po
257b2('bum): nams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis spyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams dang / pha rol//
257b3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag nas
257b4('bum): dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de kanyadas su byar myed do// lam ni lam gyis stong ste/ de ci'i sgra ra zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag
257b5('bum): gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'phags rngam bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i
257b6('bum): bden pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su byed de gnyis su byur myed do// bsam ka tan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dris
257b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
257b8('bum): ltar tshad myed pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
258a1('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do//
258a2('bum): nus par tha rad pa rnams ni rnam par brlad pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin dra ba 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
258a3('bum): myed do// mabard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma ba rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pan
258a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa la de dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par ba radra ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
258a5('bum): smond pa myed pa ni/ rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pas stong ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
258a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / pha rol patu phyin pa 'di drag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams sa
258a7('bum): stong stede ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol du phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// na/ la ngade ci
258a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
258b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stom
258b2('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams
258b3('bum): ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// so so yang dag
258b4('bum): par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis s+ho dra ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis
258b5('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed
258b6('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
258b7('bum): dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus snod ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lhur rgyu nang tu zhum
258b8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
259a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus
259a2('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis sbyong
259a3('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
259a4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang byang chub dang / pha rol du phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
259a5('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam gyi na ma pa shes pa nyid dang / pha rol du phyind pa 'di dag ga nya sa su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// bla na myed pa yang
259a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / pha rol tu phyin
259a7('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dga' bo de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
259a8('bum): thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do//
259b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'gro mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do/ tshad myed pa
259b2('bum): bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog par 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// rnam
259b3('bum): par ba rad pa brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
259b4('bum): pa nyid do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i thog mar 'gro/ ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// mngon
259b5('bum): bar shes pa rnams kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ da du phyind pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do/
259b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do//
259b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i thog par 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do//
259b8('bum): snying rje chen po 'thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do//
260a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind
260a2('bum): pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa/ rgyu rkyen
260a3('bum): tshogs par gyur nas/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yang sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas te/ sa chen po la rten cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du
260a4('bum): phyi nad pa la rtend cing / pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag rnam par 'phel lo// nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// phyi nang
260a5('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyidarnam par 'phel lo// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// 'dus
260a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par
260a7('bum): 'phel lo// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
260a8('bum): rnam par 'phel lo// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dngos po myed pa'i
260b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ yabadag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam pam 'phel lo//
260b2('bum): dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel lo// stobs rnams rnam par 'phel lo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo// 'phak+ka
260b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo// chad myed pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//
260b4('bum): nas par ba rad pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam par tha radra ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshanas
260b5('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnam par 'phel lo// mdon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// ting nge 'dzin da rnams rnam par 'phel lo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam
260b6('bum): par 'phel lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyarnam par 'phel lo// kyi 'jigs pa bzhirnam par 'phel lo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhirnas par 'phel lo// snying rje chen po rnam par
260b7('bum): 'phel lo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad
260b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/ dga' bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / pha rol tu phyind pa lnga rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten
261a1('bum): cing / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
261a2('bum): pa nyid la rten cing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtend cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
261a3('bum): pa nyid la rten cing / dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la nyen cing / stobs lnga rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / byang
261a4('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo// rnam paHrnams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / 'phags pa'i dam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo// / rnam pa
261a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / 'phags pa/ 'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / bsam gtan bzhi rnam
261a6('bum): par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / tshad myed pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
261a7('bum): 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing
261a8('bum): ma pa rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtend cing / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
261b1('bum): spron pa myed pa rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten tsa/ mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten da tsang
261b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rte dad cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing /
261b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs btsurnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
261b4('bum): chen cing / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhinam par 'a so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / dpe rjen po rnas par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams ca
261b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa bcwo brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams da mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / thams cad shes pa nyid
261b6('bum): rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / rnam pa thams
261b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dka' bo dulta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni/ pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su sgrub bo// stong pa nyid thos
261b8('bum): cad yongs su sgrub pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga
262a1('bum): yongs su sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa yongs su sgrub pa'o// 'phags
262a2('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// chad myed pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/
262a3('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub pa'o// rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
262a4('bum): smon pa myed pa yongs su sgrub pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su
262a5('bum): sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//
262a6('bum): snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs
262a7('bum): su sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
262a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las zos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
262b1('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig
262b2('bum): mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i yon tan kang ji snyed cig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/ bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis
262b3('bum): pa dang / speld pa de dag thams cad bka' ma sbal te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / spe lad pa dang /
262b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi las rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chad myed
262b5('bum): pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ra ro// mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
262b6('bum): ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol patu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byu
262b7('bum): par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
262b8('bum): pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
263a1('bum): 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
263a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
263a3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
263a4('bum): chos thas cad spong ba nyi jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
263a5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
263a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
263a7('bum): dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byang bar 'gyur ro// stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
263a8('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thard pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
263b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin thams
263b2('bum): cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bcu
263b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa byazhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco/
263b4('bum): brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan ni 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyimed pa bzung ba dang / dngas pa dang / grags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang /
263b5('bum): rgyal bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/ rgyal rigs che zhingapho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zam zem rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
263b6('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten namachis so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/
263b7('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dka' ldan kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 'phrul dka'i lha rnams 'jig rten nas mchis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig
263b8('bum): rten na mchis so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis
264a1('bum): tshangs chen kyi lha rnams 'jig rten ma mchis so// sdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// chung snang gyi lha rnams 'jig rkyen na mchis so// tshad myed sdang ba'i lha/
264a2('bum): rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshad
264a3('bum): myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//
264a4('bum): char myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten ma mchis so// zas bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/ dpa'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// myi gdung na
264a5('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten ni mchis so// gya nom snang balha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 'og byin gyi lha nas
264a6('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / grags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du med la
264a7('bum): bgyis pas nA/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dgra bcom
264a8('bum): ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// / bcom ldan
264b1('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung ba dang / bcangs dang / thags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
264b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
264b3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / thags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni de yang zad par ma bshad de/ ke'u shi ka re ci'i phyir zhen/
264b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
264b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyu ra ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pa/
264b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed
264b7('bum): ba de dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi gru 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
264b8('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
265a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
265a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
265a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar
265a4('bum): byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bu dang po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rig/ sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265a5('bum): pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma thal
265a6('bum): byar byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dod du zhugs par rig par bya'o// ke3 shig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
265a7('bum): po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po
265a8('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge
265b1('bum): 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'di la ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
265b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar bya
265b3('bum): 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ bye ba stong gi char
265b4('bum): yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi charang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs su yang nye bar myi 'gro'o//
265b5('bum): char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bgrang bar nye bar myi 'grom dper yang nye bar mi 'grom/ rgyur yang gyi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
265b6('bum): bu mo de dag ldan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las sems rnam par grol yang / chos gang yang yongs su shes pa myed do// krel shi ke rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes ra
265b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug
265b8('bum): pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / bu dud du byed pa dang
266a1('bum): mchod par byed pa de dag che 'di nyid dang / tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du 'thob par ngas bshad do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi//
266a2('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad
266a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / dbaza' dang /
266a4('bum): gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sim dan sa tshogs kyis rim gro bgyid pa dang / bkum bstis kyi da pa dang / mu chung ngu bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa
266a5('bum): de la ni/ bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgan gyi chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
266a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo zhes rab kyi pha ros pa tu phyir pa 'di 'a ton du byed pa ba'i bu brgya stong mang po dka' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ongs te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
266a7('bum): mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad bu dang ldan pa'i chos son pa'i cham pa/ lha'i bu re dag sogs pa nye bar bslab par sems so// chos smra ba de dag spasmras par gyur na yang
266a8('bum): bu de dag chos kyi rim gro de nyid kyis spoms pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/ kes shig rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di yin pa dang / 'chabras/
266b1('bum): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
266b2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang / bkur bstir byed pa dang / pu rud du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de dag gis/ tshe 'dil
266b3('bum): yon tan 'di yang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa'i tshe/ la la zhig bdag/
266b4('bum): la klan ka tshol zhing glags lta bar gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bya ba/ dar zhum pa myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha
266b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyar ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la ni 'jig rten pa dang
266b6('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / myi dge ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang /
266b7('bum): nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha myi dad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni dge ba'i chos
266b8('bum): thams cad kyi rter yin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
267a1('bum): nyid la gnas pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la kar+tha/
267a2('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang
267a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / ngo bo nyid
267a4('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la glags blta ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / shes
267a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gang glags lta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la gang glags blta bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su/
267a6('bum): myi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang glags lta ba myed do// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
267a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhus par myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par
267a8('bum): kyi 'gyur/ 'jigs par myi 'gyur/ sdang bar myi 'gyur/ skrag par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/
267b1('bum): yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/ ke'u shi /

267b6('bum): byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis

267b8('bum): ze dag gis dgongs par bya ba yin/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268a1('bum): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgongs

268a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kyi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur bayin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'phrogs

268a6('bum): nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom
268a7('bum): ba gyi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yid/ chen po stong pa nyid spros pa sti 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong ba nyid thos pa kyi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
268a8('bum): sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ zog/
268b1('bum): sa dang tha ma skyed pa stong pa nyid skom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid rlom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs

268b3('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong po nyid sgom pa mye 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa skye 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin

268b6('bum): ba myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag zedun sgom pa myi phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'jam
268b7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi sgom pa kyi phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs
