269a1('bum): dgu sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par
269a2('bum): shes pa sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzind sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgo
269a3('bum): ba myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po sgom pa myi
269a4('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre/ sa pa bcwo brgyad sgom pa myi 'phrogs par ba yin/ sems can yongs su smind par bya ba myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin
269a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba myi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sgom pa myi 'phrogs par 'gyur pa yin/ gzhan gyis phyir
269a6('bum): brgal pa ji snyed byung ba la yang chos dang 'thun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di 'dzind pa dang /
269a7('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bAl bar byed pa dang / bris shing de la me/

269b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong ba sems so// gnas gtsang sa'i ris kyi che ba dang /
269b8('bum): myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang /
270a1('bum): phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par

270a5('bum): pa dang / gnas ka tsang ma'i ris myi che ba dang / myi ga du nga ba dang / sha nad tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang
270a6('bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyand pa
270a7('bum): 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir dong bar sems so// ke'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang / ses
270a8('bum): 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang /

271a8('bum): tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang / der shes rab kyi pha rol tu

271b6('bum): gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir ma che ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes
271b7('bum): bgyi ba dang / 'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes
271b8('bum): bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sdang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /

272a6('bum): so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar
272a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ kA zi brjid che ba dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol

272b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i 'khor gis yang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo// me tog dang spos kyis
272b7('bum): gtor ro// bdug spros 'phrul ba'i snod bzhag go/ dar kyi sgra lnga dang / gos kyi tha re bre'o/ sa'i phyogs rnas pa chu mas brgyan par bya'o// kes nu ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
272b8('bum): de la ngal zhing tshang par 'gyuma'i myed de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sum bde ba dang / yum yang ba dang / sras gsas pa ya nyams su myong bar 'gyur // rigs kyi
273a1('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
273a2('bum): phyind pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/ sdig to'i rmyi lam mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// des mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi chen
273a3('bum): bo'i mtshar sum cu rtsa gnyis mngal ba/ dpel byang bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgya nad pa/ sku gser gyi mdog du bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor dab/ byang chub
273a4('bum): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mthun du bdar da pa/ chos so// nad pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la sa 'di lta ste/ skyes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang
273a5('bum): rgyal khrims kyi pha rol pa sa phyin da pa dang / bzod pa rol du byedad pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolangs smin/ pa dang / bsas gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
273a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang //
273a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa sbyor pa nyid dang / thog ma dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
273a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
273b1('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang //
273b2('bum): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed
273b3('bum): pa rnams dang / gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mabar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
273b4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
273b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jig/ sa pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
273b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi chos bstand pa yang thos par 'gyur ro// smin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de'i don rnam pa raphye ba yang zos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/
273b7('bum): phyind pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de'i don nas pa
273b8('bum): phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang zos par
274a1('bum): 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bya ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang zos par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam
274a2('bum): par phye ba yang zos par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong
274a3('bum): pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang zos par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur
274a4('bum): ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam pa ra phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa s+ho/ dang pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro//
274a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang zo sa par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
274a6('bum): de'i don rnam par phye ba yang zos par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bya ba yang thos par 'gyuraro/
274a7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don na/
274a8('bum): par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang zos
274b1('bum): ra / 'as kyi rka pa man pa dag da nas par bye pol pa 'gyur ro/ dbang grol po dngag ga dums pa pa
274b2('bum): ngom rnas par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yas lag bdun po de dag gi don rnam par skye la yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lakra brgyad pa de'i don nam
274b3('bum): ra 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa pan pa dag gidod nas par bye sa yang thos par 'gyur ro// sam gtan byan po dag gdod dum par rtse bsang po pas chu byed
274b4('bum): ban po de dag ga dod nam kur bye bas 'thos par 'gyu/ ro// gzugs med pa snyomam par 'jug pa pa'ayod/ dag zhi na pa sa pa thos par 'gyur ro// rnas
274b5('bum): ba rang pa brgyad po de dag gdon rnam par phye ba yang tho par 'gyur ro// ma par dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'dulag par su po de dag ni don rnam par skye ba yang thos par 'gyu'o/
274b6('bum): rnas par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spron ba byed pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang bos par 'gyur ro// mngodan par shes pa de dag gi dod rnam par phye ba
274b7('bum): zos par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de dag gi dor rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi dor rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
274b8('bum): bcu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang bos par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// so mo yang bdag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don
275a1('bum): rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba
275a2('bum): yang bos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// tha na myed pa yang
275a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang mtho bar 'gyur ro//
275a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni 'de ltar yongs su bsgrub par 'bya'o// sems can mang po na/
275a5('bum): 'di ltar yongs su sbyind par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bca sa pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o// zhes zer ba dag kyang
275a6('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra zos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
275a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrakra khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor da cing mdun
275a8('bum): du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra bos par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sla thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na ni
275b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge so shig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zhag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba zag
275b2('bum): thig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor da cing mdun du byas te/ chos so rang to zhes bya ba'i sla bos par 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma po'i sme bos par
275b3('bum): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
275b4('bum): theg brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan mos bye ba khrag kyi brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun nu rdzas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sla bos par 'gyur ro//
275b5('bum): byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
275b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun
275b7('bum): sa te/ sa ston to zhes rlabos par 'gyur ro// tha ga pa'i phyogs ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'a'akra thig srungad byo'i thob par gyur te/ 'dug rten gyi lams chem mon
275b8('bum): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba
276a1('bum): thag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bsko rad cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig/
276a2('bum): brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/
276a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig kas bskord cing mdun du byas te/ chos stonang to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur/
276a4('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khwa ga brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig tu/ na gi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
276a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag ka brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig
276a6('bum): brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor da cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma
276a7('bum): bo'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub
276a8('bum): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos rtse ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bsor da cingam dun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sla bos
276b1('bum): par 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
276b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig klu
276b3('bum): bskor da cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sme zos par 'gyur te/ 'jog rten na
276b4('bum): khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zha ga bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
276b5('bum): brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrag pa rgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskord cing mdun du byas te/ chos stond to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar
276b6('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas
276b7('bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / 'dug spos dang / byug pa dang /
276b8('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu rung du bya ba dang / mchod par
277a1('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten
277a2('bum): rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos
277a3('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phred ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstar bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba
277a4('bum): dang / mchod pa bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/

277a6('bum): kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pa dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim
277a7('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir ba dang / pu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
277a8('bum): dag kyang mthong 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
277b1('bum): mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs ma

277b5('bum): dang / ba dar dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim grorabya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang // mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs

277b7('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang byar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / bye ma dang / na bza'
277b8('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyu
278a1('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten

278a6('bum): kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos
278a7('bum): mi 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las
278a8('bum): 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin/
278b1('bum): gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /

278b3('bum): mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'dul ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong
278b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten / dag krung me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / badrug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
278b5('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstirabya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong
278b6('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmyi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro// de'i
278b7('bum): lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur/ u ba'i nyams myed par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa myed par 'gyur/ gos la chags pa myed par
278b8('bum): 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad la chags pa myed par 'gyur/ zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyi 'du shes
279a1('bum): kyang chung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na/ rnal 'byor de la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zas
279a2('bum): la cher chags pa myed pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa myed par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung
279a3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la myi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems
279a4('bum): dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / swA dang / klu dang / gnod/ sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' / pa dang / kyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de
279a5('bum): dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// lha phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang /
279a6('bum): klung dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la ma dang sa nye bar sgrub bo// nub phyog
279a7('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
279a8('bum): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
279b1('bum): gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i ldang dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/
279b2('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin pa dang
279b3('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ka ji snyed
279b4('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpal gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / s+ya 'am ci dang /
279b5('bum): 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// sgo nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sa / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub
279b6('bum): sems dpa' ga ji skyed pa dang / g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / phyi 'am ci dang / sgo 'phye chen po gang nga snyed pa de dag kya
279b7('bum): de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang /
279b8('bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rtsi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// 'og gi phyogs kyi
280a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa da / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / sgyu ma yin dang / nam mkha
280a2('bum): ldang dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// steng ga phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub seMs
280a3('bum): dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdang/
280a4('bum): nye bar sgrub bo// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi yu la rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'do// dad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid nan tan
280a5('bum): tu mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya/ klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang /
280a6('bum): yang myi 'bral bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ma bzung / ma bcangs/ ma blags/ kun chub bar ma byas
280a7('bum): tshul bzhin yid la ma byas na ya / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos da
280a8('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o//
280b1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab
280b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing de bris te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
280b3('bum): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bu dung du byed/ mchod par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
280b4('bum): mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
280b5('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam 'arjo/ 'bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas
280b6('bum): bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is ngas rgyas nyar thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag
280b7('bum): mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten batshigs te/ nam 'chol bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza
280b8('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dar dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ bu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no//
281a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka'
281a2('bum): stsal pa// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byar bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig
281a3('bum): kyang la las byin na/ de las gang blang bar bya// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhag
281a4('bum): kyang la las stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'a ri glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang
281a5('bum): bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das re bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la/ bdag rame gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ myi rtog pa yang ma lags
281a6('bum): bcon par myi bgyid pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku garung la rim gror bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur bstir bkyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/
281a7('bum): bu dud du bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod par bgyi bar myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
281a8('bum): las byung ba ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur bstir bgyi ba lags phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags
281b1('bum): sra gdung de dgra rigs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrub pa rtse/ de'i ma su de bzhi gshegs pa'i sa gzung de dag kyang mchod pa mngam pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam bdag de mnan
281b2('bum): gshegs pa'i sgra gzungs thangs kyi sa tog dang / rjes kyi tha pa dang / sa dang / 'ang+yas kyi byug pa dang / rnams kyi bye ma dang / rnams kyi na bza' dang / sa kyi sa rnam
281b3('bum): da / po kyi rgyas brda dang / mas kyi ba da dang / mthor 'gyid ci/ kur 'gyir bskyed pa dang / sazung du babyed pa dang / mchod pa
281b4('bum): pa'i che yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes darab kyi pha rol tu byedad pa las byung ba lags pas sam+ba dang kyai dang / rna ma yin su bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim rmom
281b5('bum): bkyi ba lags/ bkur bstir bgyi ba lags/ pra dung du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas/ bab+ba nga shing rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pra dud dang mchod
281b6('bum): bab byed do// denas me dang ldan pagar dwa ti'i bras pa'i dab po cwa zin pa 'drin du ces smras so// ke zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa 'di ni gzung du byed pa/ gzugs myod pa
281b7('bum): bltar myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzung du byed pa/ gzugs myed pa/
281b8('bum): bltar myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa la gzung bar sems// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa ni 'dzind pa
282a1('bum): dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bsrung ba'i phyir ma
282a2('bum): yin/ dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar
282a3('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa
282a4('bum): ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang / myi slob pa'i chos rnams nyebar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams
282a5('bum): 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dod bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
282a6('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nye bar smrab pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyi dang pa nye bar
282a7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa yis// nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bya stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
282a8('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yin/ 'dus byas stong
282a9('bum): sa rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
282b1('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas sbyor ba nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid par sgrub pa ma yin/ bog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
282b2('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin
282b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
282b4('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag
282b5('bum): par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po mas nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar
282b6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa sa
282b7('bum): yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam
282b8('bum): par tha rad pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mabar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
283a1('bum): myed pa dang / spo dad pa myed pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
283a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par
283a3('bum): rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar
283a4('bum): sgrub pa ma yin lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar
283a5('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin lam gyi rngam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no//
283a6('bum): brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa sha ra mA ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni sangs
283a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
283a8('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang / myi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams
283b1('bum): 'dodan par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyidad pa nye bar sgrub pa/
283b2('bum): ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol pa du phyind pa lte bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa nye bar sgrub pa yin brtson 'grus kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa nye
283b3('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyipha rol tu phyind pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ she5/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa sa med
283b4('bum): rang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po spyo dpa nyid sde bar sgrub pa sa yin don dam pa song
283b5('bum): nyid nye bar sgrub pa yin/ 'dus byas stong panyid nye bar sgrub pa ma man 'dus ma byas song/ pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
283b6('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bogs drang bas myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin dor 'byed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin rang bzhin stong ba nyid
283b7('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa sa yon/ phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid nye
283b8('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yoni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pas
284a1('bum): yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub
284a2('bum): pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa
284a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa la bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams
284a4('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa yin/
284a5('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tebar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo sto/ pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
284a6('bum): pa myed pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
284a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
284a8('bum): snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong /
284b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
284b2('bum): las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no// zhes bya bar shes pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
284b3('bum): spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi
284b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha
284b5('bum): rold tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// brtson rdzas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gnyis su shes parabya ba ma yin te/ 'azor 'grus kyi pha rol
284b6('bum): tu phyind pa ni kyi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi dad pa ni myi gnyis pa'o//
284b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rold du phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa na
284b8('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa ni gyi gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang /
285a1('bum): kewa shi ka legs so legs so// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/
285a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen
285a3('bum): bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i myi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson
285a4('bum): rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni mI gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ re tso'i phyir zhen/
285a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma/ gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
285a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// sbyinang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhes/ sbyin pa
285a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi gnyis pa'o// klemu na ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod su zad do//
285a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka kang
285b1('bum): bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhesake mug ke de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
285b2('bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u she ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni
285b3('bum): kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kes shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis
285b4('bum): su byar myed do// ke mra shrI ka gang 'dod pa'i pha roladasu phyi nad pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci
285b5('bum): zhes sashi ka de ni 'di kar chos kyi dbyingasabazod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de la ka su myed de/ gnyis su byar byed do//
285b6('bum): shika kang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pra la gnyis su 'dod pa de chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du 'dra // de ci'i phyir zhes/ ke sa shi ka de ni 'dri sa chos kyi da
285b7('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi
285b8('bum): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zang // de ci'i phyir zhen/ gsu shig de ni 'di sa ma chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol pa tu phyin pa des gnyis su byed de/
286a1('bum): gnyis su thar skyed do// ke'u shig gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//
286a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka
286a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam
286a4('bum): katan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar n+te/ da do// ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi
286a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus
286a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// keT shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin
286a7('bum): nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin nyid de gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do//
286a8('bum): shes shig gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du yang do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke sa shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul
286b1('bum): khrims kyis rol tu phyi nang bya dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byur byed do// ke spya nage gang sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
286b2('bum): bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
286b3('bum): byed do// ke'u shi ka kang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de de yang dag pa'i mthal la gnyis su 'dod du 'ang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke mra
286b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byarabyed do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
286b5('bum): tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag ba'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan
286b6('bum): kyi pha rosod tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su gyur med do// ke la shi ga kang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa den
286b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su
286b8('bum): byed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shig gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad // de ci'i phyir
287a1('bum): na/ keru shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
287a2('bum): phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthu
287a3('bum): de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka kang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
287a4('bum): kelu shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar mye dad do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
287a5('bum): gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyer sa la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dang /
287a6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shi ka gang bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bas kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su
287a7('bum): 'dod du zad ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke sa shI ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bams kyis spyi khyab pa'i dbyings de la kAny+dzis su myed de gnyis su byar skyed do// sa shi ka/
287a8('bum): gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus
287b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ke'u shA ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de na
287b2('bum): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la
287b3('bum): gnyis pa myed de/ su gyur myed do// shes ni gas nas rnams kyi sa roms sa phyin pa sa ga nyis sa 'dod pa des bsas kyis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings
287b4('bum): su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe ma zhi ka de ni 'disatshul khrims kyi rol tu phyind pa dang bsas kyis kyi khyab pa'i
287b5('bum): dbyings de la gnyis su myed de/ kanyisasu byar myed do// keT shi ka kang rna ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/
287b6('bum): sa kyis kyi rtsab pa gnyis su 'dod dum dkyi phyir nas shes ga ge zhini 'disar sbyin pa'i ma rolal tu phyinas pa dang
287b7('bum): gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do//
288a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
288a2('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa / de la bslabs
288a3('bum): pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rnamasabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
288a4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i
288a5('bum): bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag su kyang ba dag la mchod par bgyid de nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe yang / lha'i bu de dag 'khor der
288a6('bum): mchis shing lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to// zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom
288a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher stond pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang klu dang gnod
288a8('bum): sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
288b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes/
288b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyag bgyis shing gdud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol
288b3('bum): tu phyind pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' che/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes
288b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to// rgyur gyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta
288b5('bum): bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid le nad to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
288b6('bum): blangs te chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ji'i slad du zhe na/
288b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
288b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
289a1('bum): 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o//
289a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
289a3('bum): ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
289a4('bum): ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom lda na 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o//
289a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
289a6('bum): 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/
289a7('bum): rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod
289a8('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
289b1('bum): ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa
289b2('bum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos
289b3('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni smos su
289b4('bum): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las
289b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
289b6('bum): 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
289b7('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid
289b8('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
290a1('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis
290a2('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
290a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
290a4('bum): ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
290a5('bum): ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos
290a6('bum): su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
290a7('bum): ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams
290a8('bum): ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni
290b1('bum): spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o//
290b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi
290b3('bum): yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i
290b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma ma chis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'pha/ gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
290b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma'
290b6('bum): mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
290b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
290b8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
291a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha dad pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o//
291a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
291a3('bum): pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis
291a4('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
291a5('bum): rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom lda na 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
291a6('bum): rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis
291a7('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod
291a8('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma
291b1('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
291b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
291b3('bum): snying rje chen po na smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs
291b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
291b5('bum): 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bco ma ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
291b6('bum): ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
291b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/ de bzhin
291b8('bum): gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/
292a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos
292a2('bum): su ma mchis pa'i chos myi bahand te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ spos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de
292a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
292a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams de la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par chos brtan
292a5('bum): to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'o/ ga rten gyis me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
292a6('bum): byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing
292a7('bum): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti
292a8('bum): dang / phu dud dang mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
292b1('bum): bgyid pa dang / de bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid
292b2('bum): bkur bstir bgyid/ phu dud du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma
292b3('bum): mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//
292b4('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang myi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su sbyinang par bgyi ba dang yang myi 'bral b.ra'agyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
292b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
292b6('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang bkur bsti dang phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te cho
292b7('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon
292b8('bum): mchog de gnyis las bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid le nad to// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
293a1('bum): sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur bahir bgyi ba dang / pu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu
293a2('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur bahir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar myi 'gyur te/ lha dang / myi'i
293a3('bum): phun gsum tshogs pa myong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
293a4('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bris pa mthong ba de ni myi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad
293a5('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan
293a6('bum): 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo' dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung ba ha nad pa dang / tshigs
293a7('bum): su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shinang tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan
293a8('bum): la phab pa bstand pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub pa bgyis te/ gzhan la bstand pa de gnyis kyang myi 'dra ba ma mchis
293b1('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo//
293b2('bum): 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang /
293b3('bum): shi nang tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la phab pa bahand pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
293b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gsheg sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
293b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
293b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho rub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
293b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ram
293b8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum
294a1('bum): la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang // skyes
294a2('bum): pa'i rabs dang shi nang tu rgyas pa'i dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la phab pa bstand pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes
294a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstand pa de gnyis kyang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
294a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung / pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstand pa
294a5('bum): dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shind tu rgyas pa' dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang /
294a6('bum): rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la phab pa bstand to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom
294a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
294a8('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
294b1('bum): phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dung dang / mchod pa bgyis par yang myi 'dra ba ma mchis so//
294b2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
294b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher stond pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis
294b4('bum): bar bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos/ kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par brgya'o/
294b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i sgra da du zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bris
294b6('bum): shing 'dzind to// 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la yang me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza'
294b7('bum): rang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid bkur banyir bgyid/ pu dung du bgyid mchod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi
294b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu seld pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing
295a1('bum): 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang
295a2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur ba nyi dang / bu rung dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i rigs pa ma
295a3('bum): mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten na de rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten pas sus
295a4('bum): 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rtend pa ni mthu'
295a5('bum): dang ldan pa la te nad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o//
295a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las
295a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni myo chen po'i mtshan sum
295a8('bum): cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba mi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/
295b1('bum): 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyind pa lnga ste/ de dag
295b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying 'thob bo 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam grong rdal lam grong khyer ram
295b3('bum): khams sam rgyal po'i gnas sam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang
295b4('bum): de bris shing rim gro dang bkur bsti dang phu rung dang mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu myi 'am myi ma lags pa glags pa zhisagachol lan kyis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur te/ sems can de
295b5('bum): dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gangs nga rung bas mthar kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ru 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de sa na/ shes rab
295b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du gnyer bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams/
295b7('bum): gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po myi dpogs rim cen
295b8('bum): ces bgyi ba mchis ste/ de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der myi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags myi rnyed do// myi ma lags
296a1('bum): pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud byed kyang nor bu na tsam de bstas pa/ kyis lags pa donor bu na po chen pa dpa ga'i brjid myi thod de/ srung du 'pho 'a rtsiganas so// 'thos pas
296a2('bum): ngas pa'i lus lan yun mamatshan pa mamasas 'this pa de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mar ba'i lus la nor burin po ma pa gas/ rlung desang 'byung bar 'gyu'o// bdag
296a3('bum): kyis don pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na bad kan de yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i grod yang zhi bar 'gyur
296a4('bum): 'ang rnam par myi 'phel lo// nub mo'i snang bar bgyid do tsha ba'i dus man nor bu rin po chechen po de phyogs gang du ban dag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// grang ba'i dus
296a5('bum): na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de rdo bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyog sa gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de yang ha cang myi dro ha cang
296a6('bum): yang myi grang zhing ran pa phun sum 'tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de rog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam de ma lags pa sdig pa la stsogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag
296a7('bum): kyang rgyu bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa'am/ bud byed la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la nor bu rin po che chen po de bstam na de mtho ma thag tu drug de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
296a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am bud myed la la zhig 'brum bus btab pam/ myig rab rib can du gyur te/ myig gi nang dam
296b1('bum): rna ba'i nang ngam snga'i nang ngam/ lce'i nang dam/ lkog ma'i nang ngam/ lus kyi nad cig byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib
296b2('bum): bam myig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nang dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nang dam/ lkog ma'i nang ngam/ lus kyi nang de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni
296b3('bum): yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing / kha dog gcig par 'gyur
296b4('bum): ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon po dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos
296b5('bum): dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po dgos mar bos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de yang
296b6('bum): de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po dgos dkar pos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po
296b7('bum): degos leb rgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal dam chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyis dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de
296b8('bum): yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te/ chab du stsal na chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa
297a1('bum): yang nor bu rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das
297a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yang / lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad seld pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
297a3('bum): ba dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de
297a4('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams la yang yod/ rgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams la/ nor
297a5('bum): bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing lci lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar
297a6('bum): yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe' 'am
297a7('bum): rgyur nye bar myi 'gro/ de nas yang lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal pa
297a8('bum): las snod de nas phyung yang sdod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang sdod de la mos pa skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
297b1('bum): phyind pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa myi las gyu rad pa 'am/ myi ma lags pa las kyu rang pa thams cad kyang
297b2('bum): ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mi shes kyi cis tha dgams
297b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i son tan saji nyid cig brjod par bgyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tam cher ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu gdung
297b4('bum): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i son ten ga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis/ bsam gtan gyi
297b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das brtson
297b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par 'gyi ste brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i yon tan mi tshird ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzung de dag kyang bcom
