297b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan mi tshad ma mchis pa
297b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
298a1('bum): tu phyind pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
298a2('bum): pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i snod do// bcom ldan
298a3('bum): 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das/
298a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod do//
298a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig/ brjod par bgyi ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchi sa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi
298a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
298a7('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
298a8('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
298b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
298b2('bum): mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma
298b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta
298b4('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa'o/ nga pa nyid kyi yon tan mi tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshesas pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
298b5('bum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma myed pa s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
298b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba myed pa
298b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
298b8('bum): par bgyi ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid
299a1('bum): kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sdod do//
299a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
299a3('bum): rang bya mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin
299a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste dngos po
299a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
299a6('bum): kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das
299a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
299a8('bum): ngag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad
299b1('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag
299b2('bum): par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed
299b3('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do//
299b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi
299b5('bum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta rdzi snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
299b6('bum): de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod // bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// der
299b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags
299b8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni ched ma mchis so de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdub de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden
300a1('bum): pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i
300a2('bum): bden pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
300a3('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das tshang myed pa bzhi'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshang myed pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshadang ma mchis so// de'i
300a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad myed pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par mi gyis
300a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sdod do//
300a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par
300a7('bum): tha rad pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
300a8('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
300b1('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par tharang pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
300b2('bum): de dag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tam ni tshang ma mchis so
300b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi yon tan
300b4('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
300b5('bum): bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchi sa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
300b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan mi ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
300b7('bum): stobs rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das myi 'dzegs pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji skyed cig brjod par bgyid/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yod tam mi tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
300b8('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon
301a1('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
301a2('bum): par bgyi ste snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwol
301a3('bum): brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
301a4('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad
301a5('bum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
301a6('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod //
301a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi yon tan ni ched ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
301a8('bum): gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan sna nga snying cig brjod par bgyis de bzhin nyid co yon tan mimed ma mam so
301b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan
301b2('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
301b3('bum): bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi
301b4('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste chos nyid kyi yo na tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdu ba de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
301b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do//
301b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs po'i sku gdung de dag kyang / chos kyi gnas
301b7('bum): nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
301b8('bum): chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
302a1('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings
302a2('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
302a3('bum): spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
302a4('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyo// mas la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
302a5('bum): rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rtag tu ba tang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das
302a6('bum): myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do//
302a7('bum): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa rin po che'i sdod de/ de bas ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
302a8('bum): gdung de dag nimi mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i sdod de/ de bas
302b1('bum): mde bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye myi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
302b2('bum): de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
302b3('bum): gdung de dag mi mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa dbri ba dang / bsnand pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
302b4('bum): gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'ang sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i
302b5('bum): sdod de de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa'i drub du dag ni 'ong phyin pa chos nyid kyi rjod de/ de bzhi shegs pa'i mug du de dag ni
302b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyis yongasu bsgos pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
302b7('bum): rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su bltam pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig/
302b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi
303a1('bum): ga pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang nyid len to// rotsa'i nga du zhen bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku ga du
303a2('bum): rnams te mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su bsgos pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
303a3('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gangade bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba
303a4('bum): de'i mtha' myi dmyigs shing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyimabadag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
303a5('bum): kyi lha 'am sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am mtshel ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du myi dang lba'i
303a6('bum): phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi shes rab kyi
303a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang blags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
303a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par
303b1('bum): 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid
303b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
303b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma
303b4('bum): dang ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos
303b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
303b6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran
303b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs
303b8('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
304a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed
304a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
304a3('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs
304a4('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcuyongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhin
304a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
304a6('bum): bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smyind par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus
304a7('bum): sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam rgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs
304a8('bum): sam ngal bso bo'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smyind par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub
304b1('bum): sems dpa'i smon myed par 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i smon myed par thugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par
304b2('bum): shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdupa la rim 'gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags glo ba
304b3('bum): ma ches pa 'ang ma mchis/ mchod par myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/ gzung bar myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
304b4('bum): kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dung dang / mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shi nang tu bsags pa lags so// phun sum
304b5('bum): 'tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gro dang / bkur ba sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro//
304b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho slong
304b7('bum): ba dang / chos stond pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi sku mthong bar 'tshald cing / mchod par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang
304b8('bum): bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstand par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
305a1('bum): mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang chang ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//
305a2('bum): de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
305a3('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/
305a4('bum): klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstand par bgyi chos nyi nga tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
305a5('bum): gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la
305a6('bum): 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
305a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
305a8('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
305b1('bum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i
305b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang /
305b3('bum): stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi
305b4('bum): ye shes dang / tshad myed pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar kyis gnas
305b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes
305b6('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang
305b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / myi rke ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes
305b8('bum): dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye
306a1('bum): shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang
306a2('bum): 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel
306a3('bum): ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/
306a4('bum): 'di ni 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de de ba zhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
306a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di nyid la brtend te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
306a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab
306a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la rtend cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar 'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa
306a8('bum): dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
306b1('bum): ba 'di nyid la rten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
306b2('bum): rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i rna
306b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyin thos gang ji snyed cig sod pa de dag kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la brtend te/ rgyan tu thugs
306b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo
306b5('bum): 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// bgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang
306b6('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams chad myed grangs myed pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis
306b7('bum): kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob bo// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306b8('bum): pha 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul
307a1('bum): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i tshul dang / lend pa myed pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa'i tshul
307a2('bum): dang / dbri ba myed pa'i tshul dang / bsnand pa myed pa'i tshul dang / blang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / spang ba myed pa'i tshul gyis stand te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi
307a3('bum): don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshu rol ma yin/
307a4('bum): pha rol ma yin/ zad du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'du ga pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ myi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ 'jig
307a5('bum): rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ myi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin
307a6('bum): ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307a7('bum): pa ni/ rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes
307a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
307b1('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no//
307b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pho ralang
307b3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyind pa chen po te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni seMs
307b4('bum): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yang 'tshal te// sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gang gas par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bdag du dmyigs
307b5('bum): pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gso' bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur
307b6('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shed can tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis
307b7('bum): so/ tshor ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shes pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshor
308a1('bum): bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myig du dmyigs
308a2('bum): pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sngar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lcer dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so//
308a3('bum): gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// slar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ror dmyigs pa ma mchis so// reg du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmyigs pa
308a4('bum): ma mchis so// myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis
308a5('bum): so/ lce'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myig gi
308a6('bum): 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so//
308a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te/
308a8('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so//
308b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams
308b2('bum): su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mye'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
308b3('bum): su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mying dang gzugs su dmyigs pa
308b4('bum): ma mchis so// skye mched drug du dmyigs pa ma mchis so reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmyigs pa ma mchis so/
308b5('bum): lend par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
308b6('bum): phyi nang par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
308b7('bum): par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis
308b8('bum): so/ phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// phyi rang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so//
309a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das
309a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa
309a3('bum): ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dngos
309a4('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dran
309a5('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams su ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams
309a6('bum): su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyigs pa ma
309a7('bum): mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshad myed pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs
309a8('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad du dmyigs pa mchis so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmyigs pa ma mchis so//
309b1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i ste stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzind rnams su dmyigs
309b2('bum): pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myi 'jigs pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang
309b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chu nang tu zhugs pa'i
309b4('bum): 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bung dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid
309b5('bum): du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub tu dmyigs pa mchis so//
309b6('bum): sangs rgyas su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i srid
309b7('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmyigs par bgyi ba de su bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
309b8('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shika de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yun ring po
310a1('bum): spyad pas/ des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos sangs rgyas kyi chos lta yang ci smos// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
310a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gzhan la myi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
310a3('bum): pa ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug po kun la yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs gtong ba yang
310a4('bum): myi dmyigs/ lend pa yang myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs tshul khrims ngan pa yang myi dmyigs so//
310a5('bum): bzod pa yang myi dmyigs bzod pa dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs gnod sems kyang myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs brtson 'grus dang ldan
310a6('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs/ le lo yang myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs 'brug pa yang myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyang myi
310a7('bum): dmyigs shes rab dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab 'chal pa yang myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
310a8('bum): rang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig myi
310b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid myi dmyigs pa'i
310b2('bum): tshul dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ro myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos
310b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /
310b4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang // myig gi 'dus
310b5('bum): te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te re ga pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
310b6('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
310b7('bum): tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sre
310b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myo dkyis
311a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang // sa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams myi dmyigs
311a2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
311a3('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba
311a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lenang pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
311a5('bum): dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod
311a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
311a7('bum): tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi
311a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas
311b1('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs pa'i
311b2('bum): tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
311b3('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i
311b4('bum): tshul dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i myi dmyigs pa'itshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang
311b5('bum): dbang po lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga myi dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yag brgyad pa myi dmyigs
311b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
311b7('bum): 'jug pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par ba rad pa'i sgo stong
311b8('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs
312a1('bum): kyi sgo thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
312a2('bum): bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
312a3('bum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa'i
312a4('bum): tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
312a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312a6('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ke/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub sems dpa
312a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
312a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ byang chub sems
312b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ byang
312b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi
312b3('bum): shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can me tog sna tshogs can 'bras bu sna tshogs can dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag
312b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i rma ngas su 'gro bar zad do// ke'u she ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin
312b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ra/ ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ram/ bye brag myi dmyigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
312b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchis
312b7('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu la
312b8('bum): mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te/ bcangs pa dang /
313a1('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis
313a2('bum): bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad bstand pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi
313a3('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur// bcom ldan
313a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung stond cig/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
313a5('bum): bu mo la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
313a6('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs
313a7('bum): pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/ bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blags te me
313a8('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur
313b1('bum): bstir byas/ phu dung du byas mchod par byas na de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin// brgya byin gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis
313b2('bum): gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
313b3('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu drang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa bas
313b4('bum): gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung / yungs karakyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
313b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyamabar ba'aganas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste// sems
313b6('bum): can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/ thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan
313b7('bum): 'das gang la las chung ngun de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug
313b8('bum): bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa ke'u shi ka de re bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shika rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi
314a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
314a2('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur banyir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas pa bas gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na
314a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ji skad du bstand pa bzhin du
314a4('bum): gzhan gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing bstand pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
314a5('bum): snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i
314a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid stond pa yin te/ stond pa ni gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba myed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
314a7('bum): pa nyid kyang stond pa ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
314a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
314b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang / phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na myed de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
314b2('bum): la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi
314b3('bum): ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
314b4('bum): bu thob bo/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par
314b5('bum): 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
314b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /
314b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
314b8('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
315a1('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim
315a2('bum): gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur bahir bya bar 'dod pa dang / bu dung du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
315a3('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// pu dung du bya'o//
315a4('bum): mchod par bya'o// ke'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di
315a5('bum): snyam ste gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te brtend cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ ke'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang
315a6('bum): bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / myi dang / lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nangang na/ nga dang 'dra ba 'am
315a7('bum): skrag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams to// de sgra yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang
315a8('bum): bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ brtend cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// ke'u shika chos de yang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
315b1('bum): tu phyind pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang
315b2('bum): bkur bsti dang / pu dud drung / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
315b3('bum): bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
315b4('bum): dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba lta ci smos nyan thos kyi theg pa po'i
315b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la me tog dang
315b6('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
315b7('bum): bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba lta ci smos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//
315b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
316a1('bum): las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
316a2('bum): pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ba dang / na
316a3('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i
316a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
316a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
316a6('bum): kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi bu gsum mo//
316a7('bum): de nas bcom ldan
316a8('bum): 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
316b1('bum): bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /
316b2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka re bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bregs bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton
316b3('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo slob cing
316b4('bum): yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyu rad pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyurang pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par
316b5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyurd pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang
316b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyu ra pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur
316b7('bum): pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyurapa
316b8('bum): pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon
317a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos rgya cher bstand pa de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar
317a2('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
317a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong
317a4('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
317a5('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
317a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / gyi 'jigs pa ba'i
317a7('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / 'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las rgya cher bstan to//
317a8('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
317b1('bum): par 'ang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ketsu shig sems can cigacig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la banasan rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo da'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phes bya 'dam bu'i blo ga sems can
317b2('bum): rnams dge pa bcu' mas kyilam sa bkod pas rnam mimado// rdo tso phyir men/ ke'u shig dge pa bcun las kyi sems bkod pa'i sems cananams na sems cad dmyal ba dang / rtsom mang kyi ste gnas
317b3('bum): shin rje'i 'ag ta mangs songs su rtsol bam dzin// ke shi dang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bul bkod pa'i sems canan sa pan rgyal ba dang byos mar kyi skye ba nas dang / gan rje'i 'jig rten nam so
317b4('bum): grol ba'i byor te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pag ci smos ke'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi
317b5('bum): sems can rnams rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus bkod pa dang / byir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la
317b6('bum): bkod pa pas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shika rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'jam bu'i
317b7('bum): gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod
317b8('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyan gyi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i
318a1('bum): phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang
318a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang
318a3('bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang /
318a4('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang
318a5('bum): bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ke'u shi ka rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad
318a6('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsolang pa
318a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
318a8('bum): tu phyind pa'i glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa 'am kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa
318b1('bum): myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyor myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgya nang tu zhugs pa
318b2('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo
318b3('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
318b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa to// 'jug go// 'jugapar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
318b5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang
318b6('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
318b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
318b8('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus la byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
319a1('bum): pas pa song pa nyid dang / rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid pa
319a2('bum): ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa pa'i dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i dang / dbang po lnga dang
319a3('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / thams gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang /
319a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam pa ra byar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par bdad pa'i mastong pa nyid
319a5('bum): da mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa/
319a6('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen
319a7('bum): bo dang / btang goms chen po dag ge/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u zhi ga nam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes
319a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
319b1('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim
319b2('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen ba'i'i ros kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/
319b3('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye lan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha nas
319b4('bum): yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i delha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i
319b5('bum): lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
319b6('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myo che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i sku
319b7('bum): rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/
319b8('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/
319'a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/
319'a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
319'a3('bum): yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
319'a4('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid
319'a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
319'a6('bum): rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yam lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de
319'a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
319'a8('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo
319'b1('bum): rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
319'b2('bum): yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
319'b3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams
319'b4('bum): yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
319'b5('bum): rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am
319'b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shika re ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom
319'b7('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal brgya/ ke'u shika de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i
319'b8('bum): glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ong
320a1('bum): las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/ yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/
320a2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro//
320a3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis
320a4('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to//
320a5('bum): 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par
320a6('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
320a7('bum): tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
320a8('bum): phyi na stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas song ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
320b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin tshong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi
320b2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dram pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
320b3('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
320b4('bum): dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang byed pa na gzugs myed pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgya ra dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
320b5('bum): pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon pa ra shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang /
320b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /
320b7('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzham dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs
320b8('bum): des kyang rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo gang ni sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byimar de bas 'di ni bsod nams ches mang dul
321a1('bum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher baha nad te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho
321a2('bum): pa rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//
321a3('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye
321a4('bum): pan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed
321a5('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge' ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do
321a6('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che bo'i lha rnams yod do/
321a7('bum): myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og byin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
321a8('bum): yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
321b1('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
321b2('bum): byind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
321b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed
321b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs
321b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod
321b6('bum): do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan
