321b7('bum): lhag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// nam
321b8('bum): par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par
322a1('bum): shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod ngo do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod
322a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
322a3('bum): yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu
322a4('bum): zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams so/ ro// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
322a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcwo ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
322a6('bum): gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rtend gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
322a7('bum): bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
322a8('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon
322b1('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher baha nad te
322b2('bum): de dag la bsrabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur da to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
322b3('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob bo lnga 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
322b4('bum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po
322b5('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhu gas par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
322b6('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i
322b7('bum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
322b8('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
323a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
323a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
323a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
323a4('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
323a5('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
323a6('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
323a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
323a8('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
323b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'o bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//
323b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i
323b3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i sku
323b4('bum): rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam sa yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
323b5('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod/ do/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do chung snang gi'i lha rnams
323b6('bum): yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chub dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge
323b7('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i sgra rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed pa'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung
323b8('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
324a1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lharnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed kyin skye mched kyi lha rnams yong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol
324a2('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod
324a3('bum): ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi tshong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa
324a4('bum): nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'as byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi dayod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod
324a5('bum): do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/
324a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
324a7('bum): nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams
324a8('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
324b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par bar
324b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin
324b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yong
324b4('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lam cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'azas bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang
324b5('bum): byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
324b6('bum): yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
324b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do
324b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong phrag brtsa pa bam po / ke'u shika stong kyi na
325a1('bum): rten gyi khams byung bu lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i
325a2('bum): las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
325a3('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i
325a4('bum): glegs bam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba/ 'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
325a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs
325a6('bum): par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyurang to/
325a7('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
325a8('bum): 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub seMs
325b1('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'dug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// than myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o
325b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shika zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rolalapa tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod
325b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi cho
325b4('bum): pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pastong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas tshong pa nyid dang / 'dus
325b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' mas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma/ rang ba ma byed parjong gni dor bamyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhi na stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
325b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dram pa nye bar ga
325b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
325b8('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
326a1('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs
326a2('bum): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po
326a3('bum): dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs
326a4('bum): bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba 'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches ma nga du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
326a5('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'de las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i
326a6('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs
326a7('bum): yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//
326a8('bum): tshangs pa kun da 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sngar gyi lha rnams yod do// chad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
326b1('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// chang myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha nas
326b2('bum): yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams
326b3('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams
326b4('bum): yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/
326b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong
326b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog
326b7('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
326b8('bum): yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzul
327a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden
327a2('bum): pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
327a3('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//
327a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
327a5('bum): brgyad yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do//
327a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba la rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams
327a7('bum): yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis
327a8('bum): pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
327b1('bum): rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shika de'i snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i skus yang du 'brel lam/ gsoyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ngo/ bde bar gshegs pas rjo
327b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal dpa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs pam bri ba dang / klag pa dang / 'khon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin
327b3('bum): mabasod nams ches yang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las/ bag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs zhing
327b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon gyi da par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyuraro// rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/
327b5('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bra sa bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyurd to// 'thob bo/
327b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
327b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur da to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
327b8('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
328a1('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bcom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
328a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
328a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
328a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi da dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
328a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
328a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
328a7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi
328a8('bum): dang / ma so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'jas pa bco brgyad du byams pa yin po dang / na po dang / dgam pa chen po dang / btang snyoms
328b1('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
328b2('bum): phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ba shes par bya'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
328b3('bum): kade ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rosang tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
328b4('bum): yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dkyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dka'
328b5('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs 'as bya lha rnams ya da
328b6('bum): rangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor kye lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang ki lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i
328b7('bum): sgra rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dke'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba
328b8('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/
329a1('bum): mams ma dang/ nas snang ba'is rnams ya dang / ga gyid kyi rnam pa la dang / dmama' ma' yas sum tshan kyi lharnams yod de/ gas pa
329a2('bum): mched kyi sgra rnams yod do// rung bar myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes byed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi sa
329a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
329a4('bum): yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong
329a5('bum): pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dusam byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor
329a6('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod
329a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
329a8('bum): yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//
329b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa yang do// rnam par thard pa brgyad yod du/ ma rang kyis gnas pa ma snyoms par 'jug par yod do//
329b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329b3('bum): sa yong // 'jigs pa rnas pa dang// bapo yang de/ mi pa mas pa da / rgyas kyi rnams 'as pa rgya med de// rgyam tu gas
329b4('bum): bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sod do// kyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mong / dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// byang chub yod do// las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
329b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa' 'a rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//
329b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka phyogs
329b7('bum): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na
329b8('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
330a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
330a2('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan
330a3('bum): de dag sa bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i smon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa
330a4('bum): thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// san cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'ab bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
330a5('bum): thob par gyur pa to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob para'agyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang
330a6('bum): chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'dug go/ 'bru/
330a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u
330a8('bum): shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
330b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
330b2('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
330b3('bum): dong ba myed pa spong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / jin cad
330b4('bum): nyi dang / ma po myed pa'abab cid stong pa nyid dan panye bar gnag pa pa'i dang / dang / rdzu 'phrus kyi ningapa pa'i dang / dbang po sa dang
330b5('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pan/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ba'i dang / rnam par thar da pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa
330b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thas
330b7('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
330b8('bum): de che nang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang rlomam chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos cad byed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstad to// gzu shi ga nam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am tshigs
331a1('bum): bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byind na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes
331a2('bum): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i
331a3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/
331a4('bum): dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dka'i lha rnams ya dang // gzhan 'phrul dpang byed kying+ga rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi da lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//
331a5('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/
331a6('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod de
331a7('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha
331a8('bum): rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/
331b1('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod
331b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid
331b3('bum): yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//
331b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod
331b5('bum): do rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa s+ho// pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// de tho/ nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
331b6('bum): yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan
331b7('bum): lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
331b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do/
332a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ ting nge 'dzinang rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pami stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ zas
332a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// san cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
332a3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod
332a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rna mas yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
332a5('bum): chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtso ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi phyi'i snyed pa de dag
332a6('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sa las bsam gtan ba'is bkod de/ tshad myed pa ba'i dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba'i dang / mngon par shes pa lngal rab tu bkodan
332a7('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
332a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas dpa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
332b1('bum): byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing
332b2('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan
332b3('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyurang to/
332b4('bum): 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dpa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
332b5('bum): chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhu gas par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bra na/ myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
332b6('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang
332b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
332b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha'
333a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham byed pa stong pa nyid dang / dong pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang banan stong ba nyid dang / chos thams cad song pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
333a2('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
333a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang /
333a4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam dpar thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spo nad pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind zas
333a5('bum): nga dang / gzungs kyi sgothams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa pa'i dang / mas yang nga ga par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyu

333b2('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ayon
333b3('bum): tshangs chen kyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// ku nad snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnam

333b6('bum): lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes
333b7('bum): byi skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// sa da yo mas da pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rosong tu phyin pa
333b8('bum): bo da / shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyinod pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod na/ phyi stong pa nyid yong ngo // phyi rang stong pa nyid song ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po hom pa nyid yod do// don
334a1('bum): dam pa sto pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod dog dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed/
334a2('bum): pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo
334a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//
334a4('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de
334a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
334a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi
334a7('bum): sgo rnams yod do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// rtsom yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a
334a8('bum): pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub
334b1('bum): yang nga / las kyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yo // san cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra ba
334b2('bum): pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
334b3('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod na/
334b4('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
334b5('bum): nams de'i rgyus sa pa du 'phel lam/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi
334b6('bum): tha ma rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi sa 'os tu phyin pa 'di gas pas klag pa dang / bri ba dang / 'aton bya ba'i phyir gzhan sbyin du/ bsod nams nas mya ba d+ma 'phes so// de ci byor na

335a3('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u
335a4('bum): ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
335a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang nga pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
335a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma

335a8('bum): byed pa slong pa nyid dang stongs nyid dang / ririm po myed pa'i ngob nyid rlongam nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / sang dag par slob ba pa'i dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi nang sa can

335b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u shika de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad kyi cher bstand te/ de dag sod pas rgyal rigs me 'i mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che 'ang mtho pa nas
335b7('bum): mas / kyis kyi rnam pa sa dang / sa kyi rnamapa yang du/ ma'i ldarnam / na gyi
335b8('bum): 'brus dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// cangs chos kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs su nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs can
336a1('bum): chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i sgra rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ tshad myed sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// ku nad snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/

336b1('bum): ma nga/ ma ca su sa cad ya dza/ rnarnam po myed pa mtham nyam slobs nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// sang dag par spong ba rnams song // rdzu 'brus kyi rkang pa rnams yod /

336b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par she/ sa pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzung sa kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
336b5('bum): rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu na tu zhugs
336b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa
336b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnamamam su yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnas
336b8('bum): yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi pa'i 'jig rten ni
337a1('bum): khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u sha~M ka hong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang
337a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa
337a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka re bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i gles/
337a4('bum): bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byi na na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
337a5('bum): las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyo na myed par zhugs par gyur da to// 'jug ko/ 'jug par 'gyur
337a6('bum): spun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// san cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyurang to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
337a7('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po
337a8('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug ko/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par
337b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chab rgyabar 'gyur ro// gsu shig pag pa myed pam tshas de dag kyi gang zhen/
337b2('bum): sa te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byen pa dang / tshus khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa da na pa rolang tu sbyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rosadu tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan ga pha ros du
337b3('bum): byind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pang
337b4('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang
337b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bstong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dartsigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
337b6('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
337b7('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
337b8('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
338a1('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chenang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
338a2('bum): btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam
338a3('bum): du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byind na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
338a4('bum): tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag/ yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing
338a5('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe mo'i lha rnams yod do dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/
338a6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kund 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
338a7('bum): yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams
338a8('bum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi
338b1('bum): gdung ba'i sgra rnams yod do// sha nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og byin gyi rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ rnam zhes
338b2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/
338b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
338b4('bum): pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
338b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed/ pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang
338b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do
338b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do stobs rnams
338b8('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs
339a1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ras yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
339a2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa byed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgornams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs
339a3('bum): pa rnam sa yod do/ ma mo yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// spyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnas
339a4('bum): bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do//
339a5('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba na mas yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang
339a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
339a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems ca
339b1('bum): gas/ grong gnyis kyi 'dig rten gyi khams 'brang po sems ca med pa dang/ rigs kyi bu'am tshigs kyi bu mo sa las bsam gtan nas bad / da myed pa ban dang /
339b2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rab tu bkod na/ ga'u shi ka re ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang
339b3('bum): du 'phel lam/ gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
339b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa da dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
339b5('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
339b6('bum): yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
339b7('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob
339b8('bum): par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang // byang chub seMs
340a1('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs pa/
340a2('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
340a3('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang //
340a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa/ nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
340a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
340a6('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang
340a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang
340a8('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
340b1('bum): pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang
340b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
340b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dka' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher
340b4('bum): bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi dbu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shring klag pa dang
340b5('bum): bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de ba sa 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
340b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad mya tshor bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba nas sa yod do// bram ze'i rims che ning mapo ba rnam sang
340b7('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha
340b8('bum): rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa
341a1('bum): kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang /
341a2('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
341a3('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i
341a4('bum): lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
341a5('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
341a6('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
341a7('bum): pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phya stabs nya pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
341a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma
341b1('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs
341b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang
341b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
341b4('bum): pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// sam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//
341b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thard pa 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang yo rgyad #
341b6('bum): // ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig
341b7('bum): pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong
341b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//
342a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
342a2('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi
342a3('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang
