342a5('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka
342a6('bum): de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches
342a7('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi
342a8('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
342b1('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra
342b2('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/
342b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur pa to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
342b4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
342b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
342b6('bum): tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
342b7('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
342b8('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
343a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
343a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
343a3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
343a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas
343a5('bum): kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam
343a6('bum): du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
343a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
343a8('bum): rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//
343b1('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// rangs pa kur 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang
343b2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed
343b3('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i
343b4('bum): lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam
343b5('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed
343b6('bum): 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtsom
343b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
343b8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//
344a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams
344a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed
344a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs
344a4('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan
344a5('bum): rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyos
344a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi
344a7('bum): sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
344a8('bum): 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod
344b1('bum): las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir gyi 'ong ba rnam pa yod do// dgra bcom
344b2('bum): ba rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
344b3('bum): ke'u shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang
344b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon parashes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sem sa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
344b5('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
344b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs pas klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
344b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag
344b8('bum): pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
345a1('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
345a2('bum): rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/
345a3('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi
345a4('bum): ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson
345a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol pa/ tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
345a6('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
345a7('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang
345a8('bum): dngos po skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dras pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pan
345b1('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis
345b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
345b3('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
345b4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kya nga rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs
345b5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod
345b6('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che
345b7('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
345b8('bum): rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
346a1('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed
346a2('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i
346a3('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong /
346a4('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
346a5('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mad kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
346a6('bum): pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do//
346a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong /
346a8('bum): pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod ngo do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa
346b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sod ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do//
346b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang
346b3('bum): po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//
346b4('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'drug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//
346b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//
346b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//
346b7('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do
346b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
347a1('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka lho/
347a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
347a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la
347a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
347a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod na mas ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u
347a6('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myang pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par
347a7('bum): gyur to/ 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
347a8('bum): 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// theb par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams
347b1('bum): kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur pa to// 'thob bo// thob por 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/
347b2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi
347b3('bum): ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
347b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa
347b5('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyi da dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
347b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
347b7('bum): nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
347b8('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa
348a1('bum): bzhi dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spo nad pa myed pa dang
348a2('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
348a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dka' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
348a4('bum): to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya
348a5('bum): ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de las 'di'i bsod nams ches mang / du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las
348a6('bum): chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal
348a7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dka'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
348a8('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
348b1('bum): yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// chad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge
348b2('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams sod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
348b3('bum): shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
348b4('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes byed myir skye mched kyi lha rnams sod ngo do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang
348b5('bum): pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
348b6('bum): yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// kyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// dor dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas
348b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa
348b8('bum): nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid song ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos
349a1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs
349a2('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do//
349a3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa brgyad yod do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
349a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par/ shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs/ kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
349a5('bum): rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs
349a6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa
349a7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
349a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u sha ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga
349b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par/
349b2('bum): shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa
349b3('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du
349b4('bum): bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams
349b5('bum): rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs paragyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs
349b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
349b7('bum): gyurd to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to//
349b8('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa
350a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos
350a2('bum): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam
350a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
350a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa
350a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyi gas pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
350a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
350a7('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
350a8('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
350b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
350b2('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
350b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
350b4('bum): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rig
350b5('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho
350b6('bum): ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnaMs
350b7('bum): yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang
350b8('bum): dang pa'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnas
352a1('bum): yod do// chad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//
352a2('bum): nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i
352a3('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyinang pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod
352a4('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang/ pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do//
352a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas
352a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
352a7('bum): sod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed

352b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed/
352b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

352b4('bum): yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sod do// rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba
352b5('bum): 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod
352b6('bum): do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sod ngo do// de bzhin
352b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am
352b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
353a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du'i'aphel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das/
353a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams
353a3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
353a4('bum): mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya rang to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong
353a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to
353a6('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub
353a7('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'cha
353a8('bum): rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
353b1('bum): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang song pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
353b2('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
353b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
353b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba
353b5('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
353b6('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / sdon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug
353b7('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
353b8('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang phyi cher 'asor to//
354a1('bum): ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi/ 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri bu dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de
354a2('bum): pas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel par de shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag
354a3('bum): yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/
354a4('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshem 'i lhan mas yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lA rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnaMs yod do//
354a5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye phan gyi lha rnam sa yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor ki lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams song ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/
354a6('bum): chung sdud kyi lha rnams yod do// chad myed spang ba'i lha rnams sod do/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnamapa yod do// chud myed dge ba'i la rnas
354a7('bum): yod de// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lharnams yod do// nub che'i rnarnams song ngo // tshad myed me ba'i lharnams yong ro// sa su che ba'i lhan mami yod do// kye tshol ba'i lha rnam sor rje/
354a8('bum): gyi gzung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// mya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas su mched kyi lnga rnam sa song do

354b3('bum): rolang tu phyind pa sod do// bzod pa'i pha rol du tu phyin pas dado// brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyidang pa sod do// gtan gyi pha rol tu phyidang pa sod do// shes rab kyi
354b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid song ngo / ngapa nyid song // phyi rang stong pa nyid yod do// song pa nyid / pa nyid song / chen po pa nyi song // don dam pa
354b5('bum): nyid med de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// dus ma byas stong pa nyid song da/ mapa' las 'das pa tho pa nyid so / thog sa dang ba ma byed pa song ba nyid yod pa / dang bskyed pa spyong

354b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngam po myed pa'i ngos nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams song // yang dag par song ba ma sod do// rdza nas kyi rkang pa rnamams nga/
355a1('bum): rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams
355a2('bum): yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad
355a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnas
355a4('bum): yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par ri dag pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
355a5('bum): yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod// do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams
355a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub
355a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
355a8('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
355b1('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
355b2('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang /
355b3('bum): thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
355b4('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug/ par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
355b5('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'i 'bras bu thob par gyurd to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo
355b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur da to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur da to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
355b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur da to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
355b8('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i
356a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind/
356a2('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
356a3('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
356a4('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid spro/ dang pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa
356a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba/ zhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
356a6('bum): lag bdud dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rgyud pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
356a7('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
356a8('bum): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa ra rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
356b1('bum): snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs/
356b2('bum): bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir len/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab
356b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs
356b4('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// ma tshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/
356b5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs la/ nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams
356b6('bum): yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sdud kyi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
356b7('bum): yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
356b8('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bral rgya mas lnga rnamam yang dang / rtsi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// sha ring tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams song
357a1('bum): 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams
357a2('bum): yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol
357a3('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do//
357a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// // nga pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
357a5('bum): yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang
357a6('bum): bzhid stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
357a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do/
357a8('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// chad myed pa rnaMs yod do
357b1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
357b2('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
357b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi/
357b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang bya chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams
357b5('bum): yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi'o// nga ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
357b6('bum): po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
357b7('bum): kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
357b8('bum): shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka re dzi snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar
358a1('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /
358a2('bum): bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams
358a3('bum): rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
358a4('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyi/ ra 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur da to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
358a5('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur
358a6('bum): to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa
358a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag
358a8('bum): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
358b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
358b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
358b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
358b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
358b5('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan la ka brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
358b6('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
358b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
358b8('bum): chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstanang ngo to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi
359a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
359a2('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/
359a3('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul la
359a4('bum): dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi la rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
359a5('bum): yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lhanams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba 'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kum
359a6('bum): snang dam pa' lha rnams layang dang / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams
359a7('bum): yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnam
359a8('bum): yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
359b1('bum): byed 'du shes byed byin skye mched kyi lha rnams song ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa sod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
359b2('bum): phyi nang pa sod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyirang pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi na stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid
359b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//
359b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
359b5('bum): nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dam po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
359b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
359b7('bum): yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yam lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i 'den pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/
359b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
360a1('bum): smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnaMs yod do//
360a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
360a3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//
360a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod/ do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
360a5('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka lho nu kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
360a6('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan pa'i la bkod de/ chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
360a7('bum): shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs
360a8('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du
360b1('bum): bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u sha ka re ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag
360b2('bum): la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'dug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
360b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur da to//
360b4('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa panams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob pa'agyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
360b5('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs paragyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pabadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
360b6('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
360b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyid pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi rad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360b8('bum): dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
361a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan/
361a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
361a3('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam
361a4('bum): par tha rad pa'i brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes
361a5('bum): pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo/ thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
361a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher
361a7('bum): bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
361a8('bum): byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag
361b1('bum): yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod ngo do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa
361b2('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
361b3('bum): tshangs lA nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gyi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha
361b4('bum): rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad mye da dge' ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//
361b5('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnam sa yod do// myi che'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnam/
361b6('bum): yod do// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
361b7('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims
361b8('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
362a1('bum): sod do// rang stong pa nyid song ngo // phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid sod do// 'dus byas
362a2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
362a3('bum): yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos
362a4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnam sa yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang
362a5('bum): po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi sa na lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/
362a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
362a7('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo nas
362a8('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
362b1('bum): yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras chu yong ngo do// dgra bcom pa nyid sod do// rang byang chub sod do// lam gyi
362b2('bum): shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/
362b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi
362b4('bum): ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de/ dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bas
362b5('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam
362b6('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
362b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ ke'u shi ka re bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thor du bya ba'i/
362b8('bum): phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/
363a1('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
363a2('bum): gyu rad to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par
363a3('bum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur da to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
363a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub se dmas dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
363a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma don par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha nga rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag
363a6('bum): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
363a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
363a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
363b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
363b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
363b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
363b4('bum): smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
363b5('bum): se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste
363b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bsta rang ngo // ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing
363b7('bum): klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
363b8('bum): pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
364a1('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dka' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul/
364a2('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams
364a3('bum): yod do// chung snang gyi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rdzas
364a4('bum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams so da do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i la
364a5('bum): rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu ma thong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
364a6('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad byed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes byed 'du shes rtsed myid skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
364a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
364a8('bum): phyi nad pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa
364b1('bum): nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
364b2('bum): yod do// dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid yod de// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid song ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// gyi dmyigs pa song pa nyid sod do// dngos
364b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzul
364b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
364b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yodado// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyo mas par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa la
364b6('bum): brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / nam myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par
364b7('bum): shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa
364b8('bum): rnams yod do snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
365a1('bum): yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/
365a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/
365a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji
365a4('bum): snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo pa las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ chad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
365a5('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de dza snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo de'i ba sod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa
365a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo kang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
365a7('bum): byind pa 'dri'o glegs pam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
365a8('bum): kyi rang pa 'di lam zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bas nad te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon byed par gyur to// 'dug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu tu
365b1('bum): thugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// yob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// sanang cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'job po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
365b2('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro
365b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug ko/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
365b4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'dis
365b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
365b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / cheran po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
365b7('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
365b8('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
366a1('bum): dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dngas dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
366a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
366a3('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
366a4('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dag 'a ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas
366a5('bum): kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris
366a6('bum): shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha thon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
366a7('bum): tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
366a8('bum): rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan
